Klonoa, Guntz and Pango decided to go camping together and watch the sunset...

Guntz was in charge of the budgeting, planning and whatnot, since he was the soberest of the group. He also saw expeditions like this to be more for training than anything else, even though Klonoa always ended up deciding by using his cuteness as a weapon. Pango got to shop and carry stuff.

choices: Pango tells the truth to Guntz
1111222122.content:
Pango strolled down the supermarket aisle, pushing his shopping cart in front of him. He looked back at Guntz's shopping list, which after getting the first three items looked like:

1 LOAF BREAD ✓
1 PACK BOLOGNA ✓
1 PACK CHEESE ✓
1 LITER GRAPEFRUIT JUICEbig bottle orange soda
2 big bags deritos
4 pax snakk cakes
1 BIG cherry pie :3

Pango was somewhat confused as to why the text changed case after the grapefruit juice, but Guntz could've just changed his mind some time after Klonoa begged him to change the list, and was on a different train of thought... oh well, whatever, he was going to go by the shopping list. And Pango liked to sneak in extras for himself when Guntz was in a good mood like this, so he got more snacks than needed.

About 5 minutes later, Pango got to the check-out and paid for the food and went on to carry it on outside, when his cellphone vibrated in his pocket. He picked it up and it was Guntz on the line.

Guntz: Hey, Pango, you got the food?
Pango: Yeah, I got it all! The bread, bologna, cheese, bi-
Guntz: And the liter of grapefruit juice?
Pango: ...yyyeahh.
Guntz: Yeah, that's it. If there's anything added to that, don't get it 'cause Klonoa likes to scribble stuff on. I want him to get some self control, for crying out loud... I mean, what's the point of going camping if you're bringing all your comforts with you? Ya know?
Pango: ...Yeah, I feel you.
Guntz: Thanks, I just get so stressed when all he wants to do is be such a little kid... I mean, yeah, he is a little kid and all, but you have to grow up some day. Oh well, whatever, at least you understand. .. Well, I'll letcha go, Klonoa here and I are still arguing over where we wanna camp, just take the food home and watch the house for us, it could be a while. See ya.
Pango: See ya too.
-click-

..."Well," Pango thought to himself, "I've got to go and get that grapefruit juice and... somehow get rid of these snacks or Guntz will get mad at Klonoa and me..."

12.content:
Ratchet, who's life had once been full of thrill and adventure, now found himself longing for the buzz that once filled his life. It had recently taken a turn for the simpler, more ordinary and sedentary lifestyle. On top of this Ratchet was bored. It seemed like ages since he had had contact with anyone, well besides clank that is. It was about noonish and he had still not gotten out of bed, he really didn't see the point any more. Nothing happened anymore. Sighing he heaved out of his cot and headed downstairs where Clank would probably be waiting.

Six months have passed since the dynamic duo had returned from their last quest to save the galaxy. Since then, the two hadn’t needed to participate in these activities and have stayed dormant since their last excursion. In fact, most forms of physical excursion was eliminated from their lifestyles. Of course, every once in a while a bolt needed to be tightened or some other menial task needed to be fulfilled yet their lives seemed empty. Needless to say, this lack of exercise has played a small toll on ratchets physical stature. His figure looked a bit thicker than it had six months ago, he was a long way from fat and still a bit of weight from even chubby, his shape was just a bit softer. He was no longer visibly muscular but only on the fringe of being considered toned. Ratchet didn't really mind or notice as the weight was so minimal that a week of intense workouts would put him back in his old 'hero' shape. Rounding the corner to the kitchen he spotted clank.
"Mornin’' Clank"
“Well, that would be a stretch, it’s past noon Ratchet.”
“…whatever it’s not like we have anything to do.”
“As a matter of fact I have some news. A new shopping center has just opened up not far from here. The ad in the paper says that it has that it has some restaurants, a Jiffy Loob, a heath and fitness store, and a Gadgetron Ship Shop.”
“Well, maybe we can find something to do. I guess we’ll…
12.title: Just another Ordinary Day

121.content:
“Well…, Ratchets thoughts were interrupted by a low rumbling from inside his stomach. “Oohh, I’m starving. Wait did you say it was noon”

“yes ratchet, I believe that I did.”

“ I haven’t eaten since last night I’m starving. Lets grab something at one of those restaurants and then we’ll check out the other stores. Lemme’ just get ready.” Clank just stared at Ratchet as he bounded through the house looking for his clothes that he was going to wear out and the assortments of gadgets that ratchet ‘needed’ in order to leave the house. Finally, after several minutes of ratchet sprinting around the house he arrived back at clank, short of breath. With his hands on his knees he panted, “Hey clank, have you seen the keys?”

“You mean these?” Clank responded sarcastically, “He-heheheh.”

“Gimme those.” Swiping the keys from Clank the two proceeded to the vehicle parked in the driveway. Ratchet had picked out his old clothes from before he started adventuring sporting his turquoise blue pants and a bare upper half. The pants were a little bit snugger than they were but again, it was only marginal. An onlooker would only notice some tautness if they were looking for it. The pair proceeded to exit the house and walk to their hover car. The day was mild yet clear giving ratchet he perfect opportunity to drive way to fast. After starting it up, the duo rocketed across the planet's surface. A trail of dust spewed from behind as the vehicle screamed across the planets arid crust. During their travel little words were shared as a fear of choking on the sand, dust and the risk of swallowing a random insect made it unwise to do so. In about five minutes the pair entered the complex. “Wow, Clank, look at this place. It’s huge!!”
“Yes Ratchet, my scanners indicate that this is the largest…”
“You bet it is!” Just than another rumble, this time louder, was emitted from ratchets gut. “Aaghh, Clank I’m starving where do you think we should go?”
“Well, Ratchet I do not plan on eating so I’ll leave it up to you. We can go to the Buffet restaurant, a diner and there is one more but I cannot make out the sign.”

Ratchet was starving and salivating. “Mind if we check out the…
121.title: Hunger

1212.content:
"Sure, just drop me off at the Jiffy Loob along the way." Clank said.

Ratchet dropped off Clank and drove the hover-car to the diner. It looked fancy yet comfortable at the same time, and there were a couple customers other than Ratchet at it, but they didn't really pay him that much attention as he sat down at a chair in front of the diner serving thingy.

The waiter asked, "Well, sir, glad to see you here, what would you like? We've got the breakfast special of bacon, eggs and pancakes, we've got fresh-served donuts and pastries, and we've got the all-you-can-eat special. Oh, and if you get a member's card you'll get discounts for coming here often. What'll it be?"

Ratchet drooled as he considered what to stuff himself with.
1212.title: the diner?"

choices: Umm...can i have this to go...
can i get a drink with this?
1213.content:
Each restaurant looked delicious. Ratchets head swiveled as he looked in the windows of each of the bistros. Clank began to notice the blank stare on his face and the drool beginning to trickle out of his mouth. “Ahem, Ratchet I’m heading over to jiffy lube, I have a coupon for a complementary oil change. I will see you when I’m done and…try to control yourself.”

“yeah uhuh, jiffy lube got it.” Clank stared blankly at Ratchet and shook his head, and headed off in the opposite direction. Ratchet had made his decision, he was up for the challenge and began to walk towards the buffet. But as he went into his pocket to grab his wallet his hand found nothing. He stopped dead in his tracks. His ears drooped and a wave of sadness washed over his face. He frantically felt around in his pockets and came up with 10.43$ in coins and small bills, but no wallet. Not enough for the buffet or to get anything substantial at the diner. He almost walked over to jiffy lube to ask Clank if he had any money on him when he remembered the third concession. He did a 180 and saw the shady looking place, he contemplated on weather or not he should eat there but the idea of missing another meal or having to ask Clank was not an option. He headed towards the restaurant and walked through the unusually wide entrance. The door chimed as he walked in as he was met with the odor of grease, grease and more grease. Again, the hunger was too much so he settled down at the counter. The stools were hard and seemed to have been covered in some sort of drink leaving them rather sticky. Ratchet chuckled to himself on the disgustingness of the ‘new’ restaurant until he was met with his sever. Ratchet was taken aback and almost fell off the stool. The waiter was, nicely put, hideous. He stared at ratchet with what Ratchet presumed to be his working eye and grunted, “wuthca havn’?”

Ratchet sat in awe at the most revolting…thing, he’d ever laid eyes on. “Uh,Uh, I’ll have a cheeseburger and a soda…please?” The man (ratchet hoped) nodded and walked into the kitchen and returned quickly with his burger and drink. Ratchet was shocked at the rapid service and then saw his food. The burger might have been the largest burger he’d ever seen. It was closer to a pizza pie than a hamburger and had ratchet swearing that it was the size of his face. However it wasn’t just the sheer size of the piece of meat but the amount of artery clogging grease that oozed out from between the buns. He assumed that he could power his car on the stuff for weeks. He picked it up and stared at it. It was not appetizing. His stomach gurgled again and Ratchet began to question if this food was worth it. The bartender interrupted his thought process abruptly with his gruff voice “There a problem?” Ratchet in fear of getting the bartender angry or any closer to him quickly replied, “No, No, no problem at all… umm sir.” and immediately took a bite of the behemoth burger.

Expecting the burger to taste more similar to sewage than a burger he was pleasantly surprised, in fact, the burger was pretty good. Ratchet took another bite and another, soon, he was munching away at the huge burger. Although on a scale of 1-10 the burgers greasiness more closely resembled a 17 Ratchet continued to enjoy thick burger anyway. As he progressed his one ravenous pace slowed as he finished just over half the burger. His chewing and swallowing became extremely heavy due to himself feeling fuller and fuller. Ratchet released a hearty burp when he had eaten about three quarters of the burger. He had put it down give himself a break. “Ooohh, my stomach.” Slowly he began to rub his gut which was now slightly bloated and hard to the touch. Just then Ratchets favorite waiter passed by. “You dun’ wit chat?” He questioned with a raised brow. Ratchet responded with a small nod as he continued to massage his now taunt middle. “Shame it is thun, if you dun finished this un’, the secon’ un’ wuz free.” It was when he spoke that last word that Ratchet’s ears perked up, “Free?” He asked?

“Mhhum.” The waiter responded in his usual grunt.

“I don’t think I’m finished than,” the waiter looked at ratchet in disbelief, shrugged and left the table. There was no denying that Ratchet was full, quiet full but there was also no denying that Ratchet was very, very, cheap. Ratchet sat and stared at the piece of meat looking him in the face, almost daring him to finish it. The bread was saturated with grease and the burger sagged over the edges overflowing the contents of the bun. Although ratchet had finished about three quarters of the burger there was still a good amount of meal left, a little less than what would be considered a regular burger. His hands shaking Ratchet picked up the burger and took a huge bite out of what was remaining. He slowly chewed the bite enjoying the greasy goodness and after bracing himself, swallowed the behemoth amount of food that was in his mouth. Quickly before he could feel the pressure build inside him he grabbed the final piece of burger and shoved it in. Swallowing he could feel the hunk of meat travel down his throat and plop in his stomach. He peered down, looking at a new yellow bulge that had taken a home on his midsection. His stomach stuck out about two inches causing his pants to take a choking hold on his waist. He had never felt so full in his entire life. “Oohh, my stomach,” he moaned as he slowly rubbed his bloated gut. But while Ratchet was rubbing his distended gut he didn’t notice the movements of the waiter until Ratchet heard the clang on the table. Opening his eyes and looking were he heard the noise he saw another giant burger. “Mhmm, her’s ur free ‘un then.”

Ratchet sat and stared at the burger, took a deep breath and swallowed and said…
1213.title: that other resturant, it looks like it has good...

12131.content:
"Umm... Can I have this to go...?" The waiter raised would could have been an eyebrow, and snorted, but pulled a cardboard box from nowhere and slipped the huge burger into it. He held a hand out and stared at Rachet. Rachet stared blankly in return. He felt light-headed, and couldn't feel anything except for the ball of food in his stomach. The waiter glared impatiently.

"Youse gonna pay?"

Rachet flushed slightly and fished around in his pocket for his money. He handed it to the waiter, and the waiter disappeared, leaving Rachet moaning softly, all by himself. As he gradually regained control of his legs, he heaved himself to his feet. Clank should be done by now, and he wasn't in the mood for shopping anymore. He just wanted to collapse in front of his entertainment system, and do nothing.

Clank was waiting for him outside the Jiffy Lube. He eyed Rachet's distended stomach straining against his pants, but didn't comment. Rachet spoke first.

"Are you ready to go?"

Clank nodded, and together, they made their way back to Rachet's vehicle. Almost as soon as they got into the hovercar, Rachet unbuttoned his belt and pants, and his distended belly rushed out to free itself from its fabric prison. As little was said on the drive home as the drive to the mall. Rachet was driving with one hand on the wheel, and one hand caressing his bloated gut. He shouldn't have eaten so much, but it was irresistible. He got such cheap food, which tasted better than anything he could cook, and was cheaper than buying the raw food and cooking it himself anyway.

His waistline would just have to deal with it. Rachet smirked. He was a hero; he could lose his tiny belly whenever he wanted to. His slightly softer frame was nothing: He'd be able to get his hard hero body back anything he wanted. For now, he could do whatever he wanted.
12131.title: Aftermath

121311.content:
Upon reentering his home Ratchet put the leftover burger in his fridge. Too tired to go upstairs, he passed out on the couch and his body began the task of digesting the hunk of meat that resided in Ratchet’s stomach. Hours later, he woke up to a noise. He quickly sat up and brushed the sweat off his brow, realizing the noise was his stomach.

“How can you possibly still be hungry?” He initially considered ignoring it but a second grumble from his gut convinced him otherwise. Ratchet walked over to the fridge and pulled out the box that held the hamburger. After heating it up Ratchet placed a hand on his small stomach and thought, “I don’t want to get fat...” but then convinced himself that just one more hamburger wont do too much harm. But Ratchet knew that this wasn’t really just one hamburger. This burger like the one he ate for lunch was gigantic and more like four grease laden burgers instead of one. His mind, however was made up and brought the meal back to the couch.

After his first bite he was in a trance. The burger was delicious. He continued to eat the burger without a thought for anything else. It was just Ratchet and his food. About 10 minutes later he sprawled out on the couch and came out of his food induced high. “Uuughh.” Was all he could murmur. He felt a lead weight inside his stomach.

“Why did I....How did I eat that?” He thought. Rubbing his stomach he noticed a defined bulge. Thoughts of an obese version of himself raced through his mind. He then came to a conclusion. Out loud he said, “I’m never going to eat one of those... delicious, wonderful...burgers...” he trailed off. The food was too good to swear off, he was addicted. Slowly he sat up and decided to weigh himself before came to any more ultimatums. Clutching his distended stomach he slowly walked into the bathroom down the hall and stepped on.

In his tip-top hero’s shape Ratchet weighed about 115lbs (he was only 5 feet tall) and he assumed that he would clock in at about 120. The numbers spun around and rested at 130. Ratchet (forgetting that he lost about 5lbs of muscle since his last weigh in) decided that he could still lose all the weight and that the excess food hadn’t hurt him that much. “After all,” he thought, “I’ve been out of work for months now, the burgers couldn’t have done all of this.”

The mirror told another story. Ratchets stomach bowed out past his chest and rested atop his pants. “Lemme see something....” he mumbled. He then sucked his stomach in and reassessed his figure. He smiled as he looked like he had before his first introduction to the hamburgers. Seeing as the problem was solved he Happily relaxed his stomach causing it to flop back into it’s distended shape and waddled back to the couch, passing out again.

Unsurprisingly, Ratchet continued to eat at the restaurant and could now (almost) consume two of the giant hamburgers in one sitting. By the end of the first week of his new diet he had gained another 5 lbs. However, contrary to what Ratchet previously thought he wasn’t alone in the restaurant. While in the middle of another burger binge, two creatures approached Ratchet’s table. Once getting Ratchet’s attention the taller of the two said, “Me and my buddy here have been watching you this past week and noticed that you can really put these things away.” To which the shorter nodded and Ratchet cocked an eyebrow. He continued, “How would you like my partner and I to sponsor you in an upcoming eating.....tournament?”
121311.title: The Offer

Ratchet panted hard and looked up to see why they had stopped, seeing the two people talking to someone on the phone. “Well, they said, the first event has been delayed to two days later, so we have a lot to do while we get you ready”, the man feeding him stood up to grab a hose and stuffed it in his mouth while the other held him still even though, it was hard to move. “We’re going to leave now and turn this on, so have fun.”

Ratchet’s eyes widened in panic as liquid started to flow in from all the hoses blowing him up even more, his stomach grew large and his whole body started to thicken and soften. His butt expanded larger lifting him higher, his arms and legs grew large and were soon to fat to move, his face expanded as his cheeks became as large as basketballs, he grew multiple chins that hung and grew in numbers as time passed.

An hour had passed and he was already huge! How big would he get two days later? His belly was gigantic laying on the floor and taking up the room,Moises arms and legs grew fatter and thicker, long losing any ability to move them, his chins had gone huge and had grown in number and his cheeks were huge. He didn’t know how much more he could take...
1213111121.title: The first event is delayed

121312.content:
Ratchet decided that he was sick and tired of his lack of money keeping him from enjoying life, and that he would go from doing random odd jobs to a solid full-time job. Or part-time, whatever he could get, but Ratchet was sure that his expertise would get him places.

Where does Ratchet get a job?
121312.title: Rachet gets a new job.

choices: "Hey, we've got some excess product we need eaten up before it goes bad!"
1213121.content:
Ratchet thought of all the places to get a job as he drove himself and Clank home, and was prepared to go job hunting but then the thought came to him. "Hey, if I found that grease pit so easily then that means other people must too! They'd need all the hands they could get..." Ratchet pulled out his cool future-tech-phone once he got home, pressed a few buttons, selected the restaurant on a 3d-rendered map, and waited for a response.

He was expecting the the usual "You've reached the ____ service desk, how can I help you?" automatic response thing, but to his half-surprise there was a rough and simple "Whaddya want, I don't got all day." from a coarse middle-aged female voice.

Ratchet responded, "Um, yeah, I'd like to wo-"

"You wanna work here?" the gruff voice interrupted. "No idea why you'd wanna, but yeah, lemme just get your info here..." Ratchet heard the sounds of some keys on a keyboard being pressed. "So you're Ratchet the Lamb-Box. Okay I'll tell ya what, you can come here any time in the daylight to let us see how well you can do the stuff we do around here, like flipping burgers, putting burgers together... flipping burgers, you know all that."

Ratchet chuckled to himself. "So, I could just come in right now? By the way, it's prono-"

"Yeah, sure, whatever, just come in and I can probably give you 40 hours a week, maybe more if we think you're worth it. We get a lotta business cause we're cheap, you know, and we'd get more if we could just get someone to work on our damn sign and make it flashy and stuff." Ratchet's ears perked up as he listened to the voice carry on. "I mean yeah, it's a robot world out there, but they're all at those fancier places and they don't even need food, those rusty cans walking around... hey wait, your specs say that you can fix stuff, would you be okay doing that too? We'd pay you more than usual."

"Yeah, I'll do that too! Th-"

"No problem, boy, just get here and do the stuff, okay?" -click-

Ratchet was slightly mentally exasperated from not being able to fit a word in edgewise, but relieved as he went to the hovercar and said to Clank, "Hey, I'm going to get a job, keep the house for me!"

Clank, freshly lubed and in a slight robotic glow, responded "Will do" and sat down on the couch to watch TV.

-----

Clank managed to get the job by just showing that he could flip burgers without setting the kitchen on fire, and he was also appointed to fix stuff and get the sign all flashy. "I can do better than this..." Ratchet thought to himself. "But hey, money's money."

The burgers Ratchet had to flip and arrange were, to say the least, huge. But with space-age technology, flipping huge things is as easy as it is to flip little things in our world. Ratchet was surprised at how much grease went into the things, and all the junky bottom-of-the-barrel ingredients that went into it with some cheap flavoring to make it edible. But they sold well, and Ratchet got an appetite from watching all the food being prepared. "Ugh, this stuff would kill me though, or at least my figure, ha ha..." Ratchet paused a second from looking at the burgers he was flipping/arranging to glance down at his stomach, which was still large from the burger he had earlier. He hated to admit it, but it was the best burger he had ever had, and he wanted more. But he was making food for other people, not for himself, and it was better that he didn't have anything to do with consuming the junk. He thought he could serve the stuff, but the races of malformed aliens that frequented the place thought he looked weird, and would rather have a familiar, nauseating face.

Just then the manager, a hideous blob-monster thing too weird-looking for words announced to Ratchet...
1213121.title: At that greasy restaurant

choices: Just a little, can't eat too much...
Get the most out of that money!
12131211.content:
Ratchet was surprised to hear that it was lunch break already, since he had only been working like an hour. But since it was part of their schedule or whatever anyways, he decided to take it. He slipped off his apron and set it down on a table.

"By the way," the monster manager gruffed to Ratchet, "our workers get these card things for lunch, you can only use em at certain machines, we got one in the back. Sponsorship or something like that." The thing handed Ratchet a card with Ratchet's name on it. "$10 a day you get on this thing, and it goes out of your pay whether or not you use it, so you'd better make the best of it." The thing went back to his room growling, "Half an hour, lamb-box, make the best of it. And no smuggling the stuff outta here, you get employee discounts and they don't like people resellin'."

Ratchet was surprised at the $10 card that lied in his hand. "$10 a day for lunch?" he thought to himself. "And only a half hour? Oh well, I guess the stuff's expensive then..." He walked to the back room of the store where the employee vending machine was.

To Ratchet's surprise, all the snacks were HUGE, and really cheap too. Snack cakes by the big box-full, huge bags of chips, soda by the liter, everything you could imagine, distributed in a high-tech vending machine system that to our standards is highly advanced, but was pretty old-fashioned for the time.

Ratchet decided how to spend his money on the machine.
12131211.title: "It's lunch break!"

choices: After a week of using his card to the fullest...
After asking to have the lunch money card increased...
121312111.content:
Ratchet decided to be skimpy on the snacks during his work days. For some reason the snacks got gone pretty fast, and Ratchet was left with spare time that he used playing simple games on his tech-phone.

But after a couple days of this the manager approached him angrily. "So, you don't want our lunch hour, eh?"

Ratchet jumped a little. "B-but, I just di-"

"No buts about it!" the monster growled, his face and voice becoming even scarier than they were before. "We worked hard to get those cards for our employees, and we don't get that money back that you don't spend! Didn't your momma ever teach you to appreciate? If you don't want to use your full card, we'll just cancel your lunch hour all together! How do you like that, Ritchie?"

Ratchet stepped back nervously as the manager stormed off. Ratchet decided without any hesitation that he'd use his card to the fullest. "Why didn't I just use it all like I wanted to? It's not like I'm getting fat or anything..." Ratchet chuckled to himself.

142.title: Falco Lombardi

choices: Get up and grab himself more breakfast! he's starving
1421.content:
It had been a year since the Star fox team had defeated the Aparoid invasion and saved the Lylat System once again and life was beginning to return to its previous state. Sippy had returned to his annoying habit of talking, Rob began malfunctioning again and Fox had gone back whining about losing Krystal. This left the Falco longing the excitement that he had joined the Star fox team for. Falco was forced to watch, or as he called it endure, the daily charades that went on aboard the giant space ship. Needless to say, Falco was thrilled.

It was about a week after they had departed Fortuna after gathering the various supplies needed to keep the ship and the crew running and Falco had just woken up. The blue avian stretched out his wings and headed for the shower, shuddering at the realization that he would be forced to repeat this routine every day until Lylat was in peril again. He prayed that day would come soon because he wasn’t sure how much of this normalcy he could handle.
After washing himself with various concoctions of cleaning products he moved on and caught a glimpse of himself in the mirror. Falco, being the self centered cocky individual that he was, spent a good time of his day here, in front of a mirror that is. He was tall approximately 6ft tall and in relatively good shape. He was slender and worked out hard to keep himself at his light 140lbs. But Falco never worked too hard to overdo the slight build to his chest and shoulders and flat stomach, he preferred to stay toned over ripped. After the lengthily inspection of himself in the mirror he progressed to the gym. It was now no surprise that Falco exercised here alone seeing as fox had given this up after Krystal left the team. It was a light workout today and only consisted of a slow jog on the treadmill and some light weights. But even after such light calisthenics Falco worked up quiet an appetite. Swinging a white towel around his neck he headed up to the dining area where he met Fox.

"Mornin'," Falco said to fox who returned the response with a nod over the Lylat times paper which he quickly returned to reading. He never actually moved the paper from in front of his face but Falco caught Fox’s ears dip behind the paper after his greeting. He had noticed that Fox's attitude had been slowly spiraling downward with it coming closer and closer to clinically depressed. Finding this pretty hilarious, Falco chuckled to himself about the sorry state of his friend and opened the fridge to grab something to eat. Quickly scanning the contents he grabbed some frozen waffles and threw them into the toaster. With nothing to do until they were cooked he plopped himself in the chair across from Fox and try and be nice to him. Fox lowered the paper. Falco opened his beak and was about to start up a conversation with Fox when he noticed the poor shape he was in. He had bags on his bags under his eyes and his usually straight whiskers were now frizzed out like they had been electrocuted. A robe that fox was wearing was tattered and was untied in the front exposing a more softened fox that had lost his once athletic look. Though none of this was helped by the fact that he was drinking his morning coffee out of a chipped "I heart Lylat" coffee mug.

Forgetting what he was about to say and not wanting to look like an idiot with his mouth gaping open Falco quickly asked, "So…how’s the weather today?" Falco couldn’t believe the stupidity of this question.
“Were in space Falco. There is no weather.” Fox was about to grab his paper and start reading god knows what when Falco, determined to have a conversation with someone, asked, “What have you been doing lately?” He tried to say this without making the conversation sound too forced, but Fox, having some common sense caught on and responded by raising an eyebrow and looking at Falco quizzically.

"Ummm...nothing?" Here Falco officially realized that his idea at a conversation had failed miserably. But for the first time in his (?) life Sippy showed up at a good time. With a glass shattering "HELLO" Falco knew that he had been saved from awkward silence. The young frog skipped over to the fridge and shoved his fat green head into it and asked if anyone wanted anything.

"Grab me a donut will ya’." fox asked

"Yeah, and grab my waffles Slip before they burn" Being the kind hearted frog that he was, he complied. For the first time in what felt like ages the team had a meal together. With Fox refusing to talk to anyone Falco was forced to have a conversation with Slippy. But after the year of having to deal with the annoying frog Falco was able to completely shut out the frog’s voice. He zoned out. He came back when he felt his hand scraping the bottom of an empty, if not slightly greasy, plate. "Whoa!" he thought. I must have been hungrier than I expected. Falco debated on whether or not to grab something else to eat. “Wow Falco, you ate that thing fast? You still hungry?” Slippy asked.
“If you’re going to get up again can you grab me something else to eat” Fox asked from behind his paper. Falco considered the options, he didn't want to start to let himself go like Fox but he was pretty hungry. But he could always just exercise again. He decided to...

142111.content:
He removed a small glass bottle from the cabinet and removed the top, placing the now open glass on the counter. Chucking, he grabbed some of the donuts and sprinkled some of the clear liquid onto the donuts. “Hey, what’s that Fox?”

“Crap” Fox thought, he had completely forgotten about Slippy.

“Uh…” he stuttered. “Oh this is just something to enhance taste…yeah.” Fox believed that even someone as socially retarded as Slippy would see right through this.

“Cool! Can I try some of it?”

“Umm…” Crap he though again. “This only works on…birds?” Fox said completely unconfidently, but then again there was a good chance that Slippy would buy this one too. Slippy rubbed his chin and cocked his head, “that makes sense.” he said and then continued to munch on his toast. Fox couldn’t believe that this very un-smooth move on his part passed over so well and proceeded with his ‘taste improving’ of the donuts. He grabbed the box and brought them over to the table, setting them in front of where he sat. A flush of a toilet was heard down the hall followed by running of sink water and the click of a door opening. Falco was then seen rounding the corner to the kitchen. Fox could see that Falco looked pretty full from his previous meal before the…detour. His stomach slightly pushed against his shirt causing a slight curve, barely noticeable, but still present.

“Donut?” Fox questioned. Falco taken aback by the fact that Fox initiated him in a conversation and his hunger for breakfast responded, “Definitely.” His beak opened and he took a bite of the donut that fox had just saturated with the clear solution. After he had swallowed the first bite Falco’s face grew ridged. His pupils dilated and a rumble was heard echoing from his midsection. Quickly his face loosened up again and he showed the donut into his beak. After almost no chewing and very heavy swallowing he proclaimed, “AAAARHG, I’m starving!!! Quick pass me the donuts!” Fox shoved the box containing about two dozen donuts towards the starving avian. He grabbed the donuts from the box and proceeded to pile them into his gullet. His stomach became fuller and fuller as the box became emptier and emptier. After about 10 minutes of ravenous eating Falco had devoured over three quarters of the box and was showing no signs of slowing down. Fox sat across from Falco admiring his work; he laughed to himself and quietly muttered, “Life has just gotten more interesting around here…” Slippy completely oblivious, continued too much on his toast.

Falco ate for about five more minutes and when he reached to grab another donut his hand came up empty. Distraught he shot up from his seat, in a fashion that no one after eating two dozen donuts should have, and turned towards the fridge. His shit rode up only slightly exposing some of Falco’s midsection. Fox could tell that it was reaching its capacity but Falco obliviously didn’t notice. His pants pleaded to be destroyed as their 28’’ waist was getting stretched farther and farther as Falco began to look more like a well fed 34 than a slim toned 28. The pants cut into his sides causing some of him to spill over the sides giving him the appearance of a vanilla ice cream cone with a blueberry on top, as he was wearing a now extremely tight white exercise shirt. He was not fat as he has not yet digested the cornucopia of calories that he had just indigested but was bloated. Fox couldn’t believe that he could fit that much food into him.
Falco flung open the fridge door and stuck his head in.

Chris scowled at the screen of his PDA. According to the signal on his map, the bio-weapon should be right where he stood. He had been tracking the new entity for a week now, and for a strange substance in a metal canister it was proving hard to find.

The signal had led him to an old abandoned, ruined artillery base in southern Cambodia, but the trail had just gone cold. Chris scratched the back of his muscular neck, before swatting a bug on his exposed beefy bicep.

'Damn mosquitoes' he muttered to himself. Despite being equipped in his usual green tactical compression shirt, and sand combat cargo pants, he felt sweat forming on his wide back.

A grumble from his stomach made his brow furrow.

"Damn it... knew I should've packed more ration packs" he scolded to himself. Just then, a wonderful smell wafted through the hot tropical air.

"hmm... is that... burgers? pizza?" thought Chris, confused. "Who the hell has a barbecue in the middle of the jungle?"

He drew his pistol, moving carefully, following the scent. He came across a structure, still relatively intact, the door ajar. He pointed his pistol at the door.

"Hello?" he called, in case it was an oddly placed barbecue party. "BSAA, come out slowly!"

No reply, not even movement, just the smell of food, wafting from within. Slowly, he pushed the door, it opened with a creak. What he saw made sense, yet didn't.

A table, played out with piles and piles of food. Burgers, hot dogs, pizza, soda...

"What the...?" muttered Chris, even more confused. He picked up his bio-scanner from his belt, aiming it at the food. After a second, a beep indicated an analysis.

"Nothing?" said Chris, he holstered the scanner and scratched his brow in confusion. Something didn't add up. Another grumble from his stomach made him realise how hungry he was. Chris was a big guy, he needed to eat, and dried fruit and granola bars didn't exactly sate his appetite that morning.

"Well... its normal food, doesn't look like anybody's around to eat it" reasoned Chris, hell the nearest settlement was 60 miles in the opposite direction. "Surely a quick snack couldn't hurt".

James feel back into his chair, his hands on his bloated belly, "this is the life" he said.

After the defeat of the Reapers James was told to go on an extended vacation to help his his mental health after being in the frontlines fighting against the Reapers. Though he resisted and wanted to help with the aftermath efforts he found his hands were tied.

The Citadelwas the first place were normal life seemed to come back as the Citadel didnt recieve massive damage and was mostly still in function after the war. Soon daily life flourished there yet again as if the war with the Reapers was a distant memory.

James found it hard to live a normal life too many times he caught himself doing training drills or working out. He needed a hobby. Though he didn't have to think too hard to figure that out. Since he was bullying he had to eat a lot to keep his form and he needed to eat constantly. Since the Citadel was home to many different species across the galaxy James decided to tour all the different restaurants on the Citadel. All these weird and exotic foods just out their for him to tasty. Most of them were pretty good too. James was returning to his abode every night with a painfully fully stomach and then fall asleep into a food coma and then repeat that the next day. He felt like he was living thr high life.

But of course James was realizing this sort of life also had its consequences. He was starting to notice that his shirts and jeans were getting kind snug on him now. His abs melting in his newly forming belly. But he didn't mind it for now at least, the added weight just made him look thicker. Of course he wasnt going to continue this decadent lifestyle for too long anyway he needed to make sure he was in shape in case the galaxy needed him again. But for now it was okay.

James just continued to lay back in his chair looking at the ceiling of the restaurant thinking where he should go next for his next meal.

1543322212121112212212.content:
It was around 11:55pm and Mike's shift hasn't started yet. During the time, Freddy, Bonnie, and Chica were on stage having a quick meeting. It was to talk about "you know who" and his weight.

"Alright guys. We need to talk before Mike starts his shift." Freddy said. "It's about Foxy."
"His weight has gotten out of hand." Chica said. "I mean, have you seen him lately?"
"Yeah! That fatty continues to eat more and more pizza." Bonnie said.
"Now he can't even fit his Cove." Chica said.

Chica was right. Now Foxy bloated up so much that body couldn't be covered by the curtains of Pirate Cove. Now to mention that his arms were very pudgy and couldn't hardly move well. His ass was really wide. Lastly, his belly was huge. Here's a reference: http://www.furaffinity.net/view/15081786... First picture to the left.

"We have to do something about his weight." Freddy said. "We won't be able to get the night guard if we don't."
"But what?" It's not like we can force his not to keep eating." Bonnie said.
"The least we can do is keep an eye on him." Freddy said.
"Who should do that?" Bonnie asked.
"You." Freddy and Chica said at the same time.
"Me? Why me?" Bonnie said in protest.
"If my memory bank is right, you were the one feeding him pizza leading to him being this huge." Chica said.
"But.......fine." Bonnie said agreeing to watch him. But he didn't seem that happy about.
"It's 12 o clock guys. Getting ready." Freddy said telling everyone to get in positions.

As usual, Mike was checking the cameras and an eye on the animatronics. When he was looking at Pirate Cove, he noticed how big Foxy was now.

"Woah! The Foxy's even more of a fatty then he was now. Haha!" Mike said chuckling. Mike continue to check more on the others who were moving around like they usually do. Then he checked Pirate Cove again to realized that Foxy was gone. "Huh? Where did he go?" He flash to all the cameras but didn't see him and he wasn't at the door. Going back to Bonnie who was supposed to watch Foxy, he was at Pirate Cove looking for his fox friend.

"Where is Foxy?" Bonnie said. He looks around for a few seconds and looks at the hallway. "Wha....what the?" To his surprised something was covering the hallway. By that, I mean a big fat ass from a certain animatronic. "Foxy?" Bonnie said.
"Ay lad. Be a good first mate and help me out?" Foxy said.
"Damn it." Bonnie said pissed. "Of course this happens."

Forget not being able to fit the doors, now he couldn't even fit in the hallways. Since Bonnie had to watch over Dfoxy, he also had to help him. Bonnie try to put him out, but with his weight, it was a near impossible job for one person.

"Too......heavy......" Bonnie said trying to get out.
"Yaaarrr! There must be someway." Foxy asked.
"*sign* I'll go get the others." Bonnie said.

Bonnie made his way to the other hallway. Freddy and Chica were close to get Mike from his office. Even with the power generator he had, it still only had so much power. Chica and Freddy were by the close door in Mike's office.

"Come on Mike. You will have to open up sooner or later." Freddy said.
"Yeah! Very soon, we will get........" Chica said, but was later interupted by Bonnie.
"Umm....guys?" Bonnie said.
"What are you doing here? You should watching Foxy." Freddy said.
"Yeah....he's kinda.....stuck.....in the other hall." Bonnie explained.
"WHAT?!?!?!?" Saided Freddy and Chica shocked.
"Damnit. Now his fat ass can't even fit pass the halls?" Chica said.
"I know. I need help pulling him out." Bonnie said.
"Can't it wait?" Freddy said.
"No. It can't." Bonnie said.
"You better go help the fatty fox." Said Mike from his office.
"Stay out of this night guard." Freddy said. "Now.....we better go help that fatty fox."

The three left the hall to go help Foxy from the other hall. Leaving Mike alone.

"Huh. So Foxy is stuck in the hall?" Mike said flashing to the camera on the hall Foxy was stuck in. "Ah ha ha! This is the funniest thing ever." Mike continue to laugh some more.

154332221212111221221221212112111122.content:
For days, to weeks, to months, the only things Foxy seem to do was eat pizza and get huge. It showed with his size. But it actually started to seem....more than that. While Foxy waiting to get fed by the others, some thought went into his head.

"Pizza.....pizza...pizza..." Thought Foxy. "What's taking them so long? The star should not be kept waiting."

It was starting to seem like Foxy's program only wanted him to eat now. Just at the moment, Chica and Bonnie came by.

"Yo, Foxy!" Shouted Bonnie.
"We need to talk." Shouted Chica.
"Did ye bring pizza?" Foxy asked.
"NO FATASS!!!!" Shouted Bonnie and Chica.
"Listen. We need to talk." Bonnie said.
"Your weight gain has been out of control for the longest time now." Chica said.
"It's not only affecting you, but all of us." Bonnie said.
"Ye be just jealous that I get the attention now." Foxy said.
"That's not what this is about." Bonnie said.
"We are only gonna say this one last time, control yourself." Chica said. "Remember '87?"

At that moment, Foxy shouted out in rage.

"WHAT THE HELL IS THAT SUPPOSE TO MEAN?" Shouted Foxy. "IT WASN'T MY FAULT. IT WAS MY PROGRAMMING GLITCHING UP?"
"Foxy, calm down." Bonnie said.
"DO YOU KNOW WHAT IT'S LIKE TO BE OUT OF ORDER? BE FEARED? BE HATED? NONE OF YOU DO." Shouted Foxy.
"Foxy, please. Calm down." Chica pleaded.
"For once, people love me. Are not scared of me. If it means not being skinny anymore, then I don't care if I'm the city of this Pizzaria." Foxy said.
"Foxy....."
"Just go. I don't even want to talk anymore."

With that said, Bonnie and Chica left.

"Foxy, what has happen to you?" Bonnie said to himself.

And yet, it was somewhat surprising to Amelia that the individual was wandering the streets of Yharnam at quite a dangerous time.

However, upon further examination, the beastly Amelia noticed how.....curvaceous this individual was. In appearance, the unknown individual appeared to be wearing a regal sapphire blue dress, indicating that the individual that stood before the former human was actually a woman. But still, the woman's physique was rather curvaceous in appearance, with large ample breasts, wide hips, an equally ample rear, and a soft paunch of an abdomen, complete with a muffin top perched just above the woman's waist.

Of course, the plus-sized woman obscured her face with a brightly colored umbrella, which had frills along the rim of the umbrella. "My, my... Aren't you such a beautiful beast?" The woman said, complimenting the antlered beast before her, despite the fact that Amelia had a bloated belly full of meat. In turn, this inadvertently grabbed Amelia's attention even further, like a muse tempting the once-human Vicar.

From there, Amelia slowly approached the unknown woman, both out of curiosity and caution. After all, she wasn't sure if the woman was merely a large Hunter in disguise, or something far more horrendous. "WHAT *snarl* DO YOU *growl* WANT?" Amelia growled, her capacity for human speech becoming somewhat limited due to her beastly physique and newfound feral instincts, resisting the urge to outright slaughter and devour the woman before her.

Obviously, Amelia towered over the woman, where she pointed her head and snout downwards to look at the woman. "Come now, Amelia. Has it been that long since you could easily recognize an old flame?" The woman asked, slowly revealing her face to the transformed Vicar, who became shocked to see that it was none other than....
1543322212222211222222121122.title: An Unexpected Visitor

choices: In response, Amelia wrapped her arms around Clarissa in a passionate hug.
But then, Amelia began to back away from Clarissa, afraid of harming her lover.
Actually, Amelia did something else instead.....
15433222122222112222221211221.content:
(Just in case you're wondering, yes: Clarissa is an original character for this weight gain story about Vicar Amelia. Anyway, on with the show!)

Much to Amelia's shock and disbelief, the mysterious woman revealed to be none other than Amelia's old flame/forbidden lover, Clarissa Judeas. According to the beastly Vicar's memories, Clarissa was a well-established blood relative of House Judeas, who were known to monopolize the meat industry, since this family of nobles owned various slaughterhouses and meat markets across Yharnam as a whole. However, several of the noblewomen of House Judeas dabbled some in the bakery industry as well.

However, despite her status as a noble, Clarissa only had eyes for one individual. More specifically, Vicar Amelia. Unfortunately, due to her deep connections and ties to the Healing Church, it was considered forbidden and highly taboo for a female member of the Church to have a romantic relationship with an individual of the same gender. And yet, even after she was forced to sever her relationship with Clarissa, Amelia still harbored deep loving affection toward the curvaceous noblewoman, even after physically succumbing to the Scourge of the Beast plague, becoming the antlered wolf creature she has now become, despite retaining her human sentience.

".....CLARISSA?" Amelia asked, recognizing Clarissa's sweet nectar-like scent, where she then heard Clarissa spoke toward her and said, "Come closer, Amelia. I want to see those lovely eyes of yours." In response, Amelia lowered her lupine head and snout, laying it right next to Clarissa. From there, the plus-sized noblewoman carefully lifted the enlarged ceremonial veil from Amelia's lupine face, attempting to look at the beastly Vicar in the eyes. In turn, this didn't just confirm to Amelia if she indeed was conversing with her long-lost lover, but also display the current physical state of her eyes.

Although her irises remained a radiant cobalt blue, Amelia's transformation into beasthood had altered the white sclera of her eyes, tinting them with a tainted yellow hue. Upon glancing at Clarissa, Amelia's beastly urges have temporarily subsided, like an animal reuniting with their chosen mate. Of course, Amelia then felt Clarissa wrap her arms around Amelia's lupine snout in a loving embrace and said, "Oh, Amelia. I'm greatly relieved that you're still capable of recognizing me."

"BUT *snarl* HOW? HOW CAN YOU STILL *growl* REC~snarl~RECOGNIZE ME?" Amelia asked, still quite confused as to how Clarissa could easily tell that it was her, despite the realization that she was now a victim of the Scourge of the Beast plague, becoming the antlered lupine beast she has become. In response, Clarissa stared at the beastly Amelia and explained, "I recognized that it was you by your tattered garbs, my love. Though, I'm quite surprised but thankful that you still retain your intelligence, despite your....beastly appearance."
15433222122222112222221211221.title: Clarissa of House Judeas

choices: Fortunately, Clarissa & Amelia made it out of Yharnam effortlessly.
Unfortunately, Clarissa & Amelia ran into some trouble along the way.
Actually, they encountered something or someone else instead.....
154332221222221122222212112211.content:
And yet, despite her newfound beastly appearance, Vicar Amelia began to shed these tears of joy from her yellowed eyes, as she then wrapped her elongated arms around Clarissa in a deep, loving embrace. In turn, this showed the beastly Vicar that despite her transformation into an antlered beast by the Scourge of the Beast plague, the plus-sized woman held tenderly in her inhuman grasp still displayed romantic feelings toward Amelia.

"*giggle* It's so good to see that you still harbor feelings for me, Amelia." Clarissa said, who responded by hugging Amelia's lupine snout, returning those affectionate feelings toward the transformed Vicar. Needless to say, the reunion between these two felt quite satisfying. Moments later, Amelia severed the embrace with her beloved Clarissa, gently lowering the voluptuous woman back onto the cobbled street, where the beastly Vicar slowly turned her gaze away from the curvaceous noblewoman and answered, "YOU....*growl* YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE *snarl* *growl* COME HERE, CLARISSA. *snarl* NOT 'TIS NIGHT."

Obviously, Clarissa clearly understood what Amelia was talking about, aware of the notorious epidemic known as the Scourge of the Beast plague. And yet, despite her lover's valid warning and the knowledge of this horrendous but somewhat contagious disease, Clarissa ignored the foreboding danger that Yharnam now holds, all in an attempt to reach her beloved Vicar Amelia.

Fortunately for the voluptuous noblewoman, her efforts were proven fruitful, as she has reunited with her forbidden lover, despite the inevitable possibility that Amelia might be infected with the Scourge of the Beast plague. However, Clarissa could clearly understand what Amelia was referencing. After all, judging from the somber tone of Amelia's voice, Clarissa understood that the beastly Vicar was frightened at the mere thought of her unwillingly succumbing to her newfound beastly instincts, bringing unintentional harm to her lover.

However, in her best attempt to reassure the beastly Vicar, Clarissa cautiously approached the antlered beast that was Amelia, placing a hand upon the back of Amelia's furry paw-like right hand, then truthfully spoke toward the beastly Vicar and replied, "...I know, my love. But...I don't care about the various dangers scurrying through the streets of Yharnam. I only care about your well-being, even if you have been afflicted by the Scourge of the Beast. And yet, from what I've bared witness to, you still retain your humanity, despite your transformation into a beast."

After hearing those words of passion from the plus-sized woman before her, Amelia slowly turned her head to face her beloved Clarissa, realizing how devoted the voluptuous noblewoman was with their love. In turn, this made Amelia contemplate some on what her life would've been like if she had abandoned the Healing Church and joined her lover in House Judeas, how happier her life would've been. And yet, this made the former human think that maybe....maybe this was fate giving her a second chance at love and happiness, just as Clarissa spoke to her once more and said, "Please, let us leave this accursed city and live out the rest of our days in House Judeas."

Hearing what Clarissa had said, Amelia's thoughts of fate offering happiness to her on a brass platter were confirmed. Plus, thinking back to her time as a Vicar of the Healing Church, she has seen her fellow clerics, nuns, priests, Church Hunters, and Church Huntresses either slaughtered by those afflicted with the Scourge of the Beast plague, or succumbing to the plague and becoming beasts themselves. Along with that, Amelia still recounted the occasional attempts on her life by numerous Hunters when she eventually became a beast herself.

Sure, these Hunters were defeated by her claws and consumed for survival, but she could still recall some of the physical scars that were inflicted upon her physique by the weapons the Hunters, especially when said Hunters used serrated weapons like the Saw Cleaver, which was purposely designed against beasts. And now, thanks to her newfound hunger, Amelia soon came to the realization that the overall situation was becoming all the more grim for Yharnam, for both the city, the Healing Church, and of course, the city's denizens.

Knowing that Yharnam would inevitably be fully succumbed to the Scourge of the Beast plague, Amelia now understood that leaving Yharnam and joining Clarissa in House Judeas sounded not just the only option available left besides staying in the city and wait until a Hunter ended her life as a beast, it was a more peaceful alternative than waiting for the inevitable outcome that awaited for a beast like her. From there, Amelia exhaled a deep long sigh, then gazed upon the curvaceous noblewoman and answered, "ALRIGHT, CLARISSA. *growl* *snarl* I'LL *growl* I'LL JOIN YOU AT *snarl* HOUSE JUDEAS. I'M TIRED *growl* OF BEING HUNTED LIKE A *snarl* *growl* LIKE A BEAST."

Upon hearing the beastly Vicar's words with her own two ears, Clarissa could not help but feel excited at Amelia's acceptance, causing her to hug the former human in response as she replied, "Oh thank you, Amelia! I knew you would agree with me, my love." But then, all of a sudden, both the inhuman Amelia and the voluptuous Clarissa suddenly heard the loud growling noise emanating from nearby. The culprit: Vicar Amelia's stuffed belly, bloated with man-sized chunks of meat gurgling inside the beastly Vicar's rounded stomach.

In turn, this caused the antlered beast that was Amelia to bear a crimson red blush on her lupine head and snout, greatly embarrassed from such unintended gluttony from earlier. This made Clarissa let out a light chuckle, as she approached Amelia's bulging abdomen, where she lightly patted the bulging furry gut and said, "My my, it seems you're developing quite an appetite, aren't you dear? *giggle*" "*growl* NOT INTENTIONALLY." Amelia answered, still bearing a deep crimson blush on her lupine snout.

Of course, Clarissa then spoke once more toward her beloved Amelia and explained, "Don't fret. I'm quite certain that we have more than enough meat to satiate your.....beastly cravings, Amelia." From there, Clarissa began to walk down a wide cobbled street, which prompted Amelia to soon follow, just to both keep her safe and escort the plus-sized noblewoman out of Yharnam.
154332221222221122222212112211.title: A Beastly Reunion

choices: Finally, Amelia & Clarissa reached the awaiting carriage to House Judeas.
However, Clarissa & Amelia unfortunately ran into some trouble along the way.
Actually, they ran into something or someone else instead.....
1543322212222211222222121122111.content:
Although their primary objective was to leave the tainted city of Yharnam, it was frankly easier said than done. After all,both Amelia and Clarissa were forced to take various detours throughout the multiple complex cobbled streets of Yharnam, outright avoiding any and all scuffles with numerous beastly creatures scattered throughout the once pure city, whether these took on the forms of the mobs of corrupted Yharnamites treading through the hallowed streets, their equally tainted hounds, the malformed and grotesque Beast-Men, the skittish Crows perched on the archways scattered throughout Yharnam, to even the bloodthirsty Werewolves stalking on the upper levels of Yharnam.

Suffice to say, their journey to leave the city was a long, convoluted, and daunting task, as Amelia carried the curvaceous Clarissa in her beastly grasp on one hand, whilst using her newfound beastly strength, agility, and prowess to traverse the numerous layers of Yharnam. Fortunately for the two forbidden lovers, their effort was proven fruitful, as they inevitably reached one of the large main gates that were scattered across different sections of the city.

"IS THIS *growl* THE GATE?" Amelia asked, as she gently lowered Clarissa onto the cobbled street, allowing the plump noblewoman to approach the gate, examining it to see if it was marked with chalk, which she used as a method to easily recognize which gate she used to enter Yharnam. Of course, Clarissa took full notice of the chalk marked on the gate's bars, where she then turned around to face the beastly Vicar, nodding twice in confirmation and answered, "Fortunately for us, it is. Now then, there shall be a carriage waiting for us within Hemwick Charnel Lane. From there, it should transport us to the Judeas Estate. Though, due to your....current condition, I'm afraid you will have to follow the carriage on foot."

"*growl* I'M USED TO *snarl* IT BY NOW, CLARISSA." Amelia replied, reassuring Clarissa that the former human had grown accustomed to traversing in her current inhuman physique. And with that, Clarissa stood aside as Amelia used her beastly strength to tear the locked gate asunder, prying open the metal and iron gates with relative ease, allowing both her and the voluptuous noblewoman to proceed down the pathway which led to Hemwick Charnel Lane.

From what she was able to remember, Amelia knew that Hemwick was considered the outskirts of Yharnam, with decrepit and abandoned buildings that have seen better days, along with numerous tombstones scattered across almost every grassy knoll in Hemwick. Despite now becoming an antlered beast, that area still made her skin crawl due to the eerie and haunting atmosphere Hemwick displayed in full view. However, knowing that the only way out of Yharnam was residing in Hemwick, Amelia temporarily suppressed her uneasiness about the place, and continued to follow Clarissa into Hemwick Charnel Lane.
1543322212222211222222121122111.title: Leaving Yharnam

choices: Clarissa's 2 sisters & mother were now beasts, fattened up from eating meat.
Clarissa's mother was now a beast, fattened up from consuming large pigs.
Actually, it was something or someone else instead.....
15433222122222112222221211221111.content:
Upon reaching the decrepit and derelict grounds of Hemwick Charnel Lane, Amelia and Clarissa cautiously but progressively made their way across the hallowed dirt roads and damaged cobbled streets of Hemwick. Although they occasionally encountered some of the more hostile locals of Hemwick, Amelia eradicated such threats with relative ease due to her beastly inhuman strength.

Fortunately for the two lovers, they eventually reached the awaiting carriage that led to House Judeas. However, having misinterpreted that Amelia was hunting Clarissa, the 3 bodyguards protecting the carriage unsheathed their weapons, ready to defend their client with their lives. "Calm down, gentlemen! Amelia has not brought any physical harm upon me." Clarissa answered, causing the bodyguards to become confused upon hearing that the plump noblewoman was defending the antlered beast before them.

From there, Clarissa spoke once more and asked, "What? Do you not easily recognize a member of the Healing Church due to her beastly physique?" Of course, this eventually persuaded the bodyguards, causing them to slowly lower their weapons and sheath their firearms upon understanding that Amelia was with the voluptuous noblewoman. Then, Clarissa proceeded to enter inside the carriage, as it took off toward House Judeas, with Amelia following not too far behind.

========

Eventually, after several hours of traversing the vast landscape, Amelia and Clarissa finally arrived at the expansive Judeas Castle: the centuries-old home of House Judeas. Upon stopping by the main entrance, Clarissa stepped out of the carriage, where she then gazed upon an exhausted Amelia, who was panting heavily from exhaustion. "Well, we have arrived. I greatly apologize for providing adequate transportation, my love." Clarissa apologized, feeling sorry for forcing Amelia to traverse on foot.

"NO *growl* PROBLEM." Amelia replied, reassuring the curvaceous noblewoman, where they then approached the enormous main gates as the gate opened access into the expansive castle grounds. But as they progressed through the castle grounds, Clarissa spoke toward her beloved Amelia and confessed, "Though, I must confess, my love: You are not the only individual I hold dear who has been infected with the Scourge of the Beast plague."

Obviously, this caused great confusion for the beastly Amelia upon hearing such news, where she then tilted her lupine head to the right a little from confusion and asked, "WHAT ARE *snarl* YOU TALKING *growl* ABOUT, CLARISSA?" In turn, this made the plump noblewoman let out a sigh, before she then looked upon her transformed lover and answered, "....It would be best explained if I show you." From there, Clarissa guided Amelia toward an enormous, well-maintained structure, perfect for housing a creature of Amelia's size or larger. Once the large double doors were opened, it was revealed that....
15433222122222112222221211221111.title: From Hemwick, To House Judeas

choices: Amelia devoured the entire pig, stuffing her stomach to the brim.
Amelia devoured over half of the pig, stopping due to an overstuffed belly.
154332221222221122222212112211111.content:
Upon looking at the unbelievable sight before her, Amelia couldn't help but drop her lupine jaw some in shock and disbelief once she gazed her beastly eyes upon what, or rather who, laid before her: There were these 3 Beasts residing inside the expansive building. 2 of them were a little over half of Amelia's current size, while there was another Beast that was as equally as large as Amelia.

However, there was one thing that the beastly Vicar immediately noticed on sight: all 3 of these beastly creatures were considered to be morbidly obese, with rotund bulging bellies, thick plump arms and legs, fat cushiony rumps, and slightly chubby cheeks. Aside from their rotund bulky physiques, Amelia also noticed that the 3 Beasts were also wearing these giant dresses, large enough for a beast of her size, which clearly showed off their rotund frames and fat-laden curves.

Suffice to say, the sight before them left Amelia utterly even more confused, where she then looked down at Clarissa and asked, "CLARISSA, *growl* WHO ARE THEY?" From there, Clarissa then turned around to face her transformed lover, as the plump noblewoman spoke toward Amelia and explained, "Amelia......Meet my mother and two sisters, Annabelle and Catherine. Like you, they are....afflicted, with the Scourge of the Beast plague."

Of course, this obviously gave Amelia some clarity as to the identities of the 3 rotund beasts before them, making the transformed Vicar feel sympathetic toward her lover's plight. And yet, this raised a few questions for Amelia to wrap her brain around, like "How did this happen?", "How long have Clarissa's mother and sisters been like this?", and "Do they still retain their humanity like her or were they now mindless beasts consumed with sheer gluttony?"

Fortunately for Amelia, she was about to get those answers resolved, as the 3 corpulent beasts then took notice of her and Clarissa almost instantaneously, where, surprisingly, waved a plump paw-like hand at Clarissa and said, "WELCOME HOME, *purr* CLARISSA." In turn, this revealed to Amelia that Clarissa's mother still retained most of her humanity, which was quite a rare occurrence considering.

In response, Clarissa calmly approached her beastly mother, where the voluptuous noblewoman gently rubbed her mother's fat furry abdomen and replied, "Hello, mother. It's so good to see you, Annabelle, and Catherine once more." From there, it was there that Clarissa's mother finally took notice of the antlered lupine beast that was Vicar Amelia, as she then spoke toward her beloved Clarissa and asked, "MAY I ASK *purr* WHO IT IS EXACTLY YOU HAVE *growl* RETURNED HOME WITH, *purr* MY BELOVED DAUGHTER?"

Obviously knowing that her mother was referring to Amelia, Clarissa then looked up toward her transformed mother and answered, "That's Amelia, mother. I'm quite sure you still remember her, right?" Upon hearing such a familiar name, Clarissa's mother slowly rose to her paw-like feet, where she profoundly waddled on all fours due to her girth, slowly approaching Amelia with intrigue and curiosity. Upon closer inspection, Amelia could see that Clarissa's mother had numerous feline features in her current form, along with various other features that were akin to several different animals, like how Amelia sported lupine features but also had deer antlers as well.

This would explain how Clarissa's mother was purring a little while she spoke. Once she was done circling around the beastly Vicar, Clarissa's mother then stood snout to snout with Amelia, where a intrigued smirk appeared on the rotund matriarch's feline snout, as if she easily recognized who Amelia was and said, "*giggle* MY MY, *purr* AREN'T YOU SUCH A BEAUTIFUL BEAST." The compliment inadvertently caused the beastly Vicar to blush profusely from embarrassment, seeing as how she was complimented as a "Beautiful Beast" by her lover's own mother, albeit her lover's own transformed mother, but her lover's mother nonetheless.

But suddenly, Amelia's stomach began to unintentionally growl intensely, demanding to be fed with rich juicy meat. In turn, Clarissa's mother couldn't help but let out a playful giggle in response, as she then spoke toward Amelia and said, "NOT TO MENTION *purr* HUNGRY. COME IN, COME IN, *purr* THERE'S MORE THAN ENOUGH MEAT TO SHARE." From there, Clarissa's mother proceeded to haul out a large rotund pig, similar to the same hogs sparingly seen across Yharnam. Of course, the beastly matriarch of House Judeas restrained the hulking porcine with both her weight and girth, grasping the pig's flesh with her paw-like hands.

Of course, Amelia couldn't help but drool upon seeing how much meat the corpulent hog was hauling around, making her inhuman instincts tempting her to give in to her beastly cravings.And yet, that's exactly what happened, as Amelia lunged at the massive porcine, viciously and mercilessly biting into the pig's thick bulky neck with her sharp canine teeth, causing the pig to squeal wildly in pain, attempting to free itself from Amelia's vice-like grip, as the beastly Vicar used her sharp claws to slice at the hog's bulky flesh, tearing off large chunks of meat and consuming said chunks with relative ease, devouring more and more pig meat by the minute, killing the enormous hog from making it succumb to it's injuries. But in the end though.....
154332221222221122222212112211111.title: Beastly Relatives

choices: Amelia realized that Clarissa might eventually become a beast herself.
Amelia began to fall into a food coma, due to being overstuffed with meat.
1543322212222211222222121122111111.content:
(WARNING: The explanation that Clarissa gives to Amelia is considered non-canon to the overall story of Bloodborne and it's lore. This is just a concept from a fan of the game. Anyway, Enjoy!)

Eventually, over the course of nearly an entire hour, Amelia surprisingly managed to consume the entire gargantuan porcine, reducing the hulking hog into nothing more than a dead skeleton of it's former self, as the bones themselves were licked completely clean of any remaining meat residue. However, despite the shocking success in consuming the enormous member of the Judeas livestock, it didn't rule out the results and aftermath of such consumption.

In turn, this left the group with a moaning antlered beast that was Vicar Amelia, who leaned herself against one of the sturdy walls, groaning in some sense of pain due to her now overly bloated stomach, which was now past stuffed to the brim, as her now bulging stomach forcefully pressed her animalistic hind legs apart. With her stomach appearing to reach the brink of rupturing from too much consumed meat, Amelia could hear her own stomach emitting these loud gurgling noises, which indicated that her stomach was in the midst of slowly digesting the consumed porcine flesh, preventing said organ from rupturing internally.

"*long painful groan* SOOOO....*growl*...STUFFED." Amelia moaned, obviously attempting to deter herself from any further physical movement, laying a clawed paw-like hand on the top of her engorged and bloated abdomen. But it was there that Clarissa's mother calmly approached the stuffed Amelia, displaying a Cheshire Cat-like grin on her plump feline face and snout, as if she seemed quite impressed with the beastly Vicar's beastly display of sheer gluttony. From there, she spoke toward Amelia with a soothing yet risque tone and said, "*purr* DO NOT FRET, AMELIA. *light growl* YOU WILL BECOME *purr* ACCUSTOMED TO SUCH FEASTING. THOUGH, I MUST ADMIT: I AM THOROUGHLY IMPRESSED *growl* BY YOUR RAVENOUS HUNGER *purr*."

Of course, Amelia was completely unsure if what Clarissa's mother had said to her was either a compliment or mere sarcasm. Either way, Amelia slowly turned her lupine snout to face the Judeas matriarch and hesitantly replied, "UM....*growl* THANK YOU, MRS. JUDEAS?" "*giggle* OH PLEASE *purr*, YOU CAN SIMPLY CALL ME ELEANOR, *light growl* MY DEAR." Clarissa's mother answered, allowing Amelia to use her first name to address her, gently stroking Amelia's overstuffed and bulging belly with a steady paw-like hand, giving the transformed Vicar a weird but oddly soothing and comfortable feeling swelling within her.

In her mind, now she somewhat understood how a dog would feel if someone would gently scratch their belly repeatedly, as Eleanor's belly rubbing was causing Amelia to pant a little, sticking her lupine tongue out in the process. And yet, Amelia still couldn't understand how Clarissa's mother and sisters were still able to retain their sentience despite transforming into beasts themselves.

"SO *growl*, I GATHER THAT YOU'RE *purr* ABSOLUTELY CURIOUS REGARDING *light growl* OUR BEASTHOOD, CORRECT?" Eleanor asked, catching the beastly Vicar completely by surprise, despite not confessing such a question beforehand. However, the transformed matriarch of House Judeas could somehow see right through her on that subject, as Amelia hesitantly nodded once in confirmation, causing Eleanor to display Cheshire Cat-like grin once more in a sense of acknowledgment.

Shortly after that, Eleanor turned around to gaze upon her second eldest daughter, Clarissa, who was playing around with Annabelle and Catherine, using a large rubber ball as a source of entertainment for her beastly siblings, as she then spoke toward Clarissa in a maternal tone and asked, "CLARISSA DEAR, *purr* WOULD YOU KINDLY EXPLAIN *light growl* TO YOUR BELOVED AMELIA IN *purr* REGARDS TO OUR CONDITION?" "Of course, Mother." Clarissa answered, where she stopped playing with Annabelle and Catherine, approaching the stuffed Amelia, while the beastly matriarch waddled toward a side of the building opposite of the two beastly siblings, watching over them like a mother bear as she carefully laid down on her fat furry belly.

Once she made her way to her beastly lover, Clarissa laid against the side of Amelia's left hind leg, enjoying how soft Amelia's fur was. From there, Amelia looked down at the plump noblewoman and asked, "I STILL DON'T *growl* GET IT. HOW'S YOUR *snarl* MOTHER AND SISTERS *growl* ABLE TO RETAIN *snarl* THEIR HUMANITY--" "Despite transforming into Beasts? Well, allow me to elaborate..." Clarissa answered, completing Amelia's question in the process.

From there, Clarissa began to divulge into thorough detail in regards to how her mother and younger sisters were still able to preserve their humanity while in their current conditions and explained, "Since you happen to be a Vicar of the Healing Church, I'm guessing you are quite familiar with the treatment known as Blood Healing?" In response, Amelia nodded in confirmation, obviously familiar with what her beloved Clarissa was talking about, as the curvaceous noblewoman continued her explanation and said, "Well, as you know by now, my grandmother, her brother, and two sisters were profound and well-established members of the Healing Church's Choir. When the previous Scourge of the Beast plague appeared, they were originally with the concept of using Hunters to hunt down Beasts. However, from what my grandmother told my mother and I, something.....bad, happened to her brother. He was infected with the Scourge of Beast plague, transformed into a Beast."

"The Hunters of the Healing Church were forced to put him down. This tore apart my grandmother, since my great-uncle was trying to get away from her, not wanting to bring her harm once he transformed into a Beast. And yet, despite turning into a Beast, my grandmother could see some semblance of humanity still inside what her brother had become. So, she ended up experimenting in Old Blood, attempting to conjure up a method to allow someone to retain their sentience, despite the transformation into Beasthood. After all, even if someone turned into a Beast, one must remember that these Beasts were once human before descending into Beasthood." Clarissa explained, giving Amelia some thoughts to contemplate on.

Moments later after that, Clarissa continued her explanation once more and explained, "...Anyway, my grandmother eventually discovered the fruition of her experiments, which originated from mixing Old Blood with Pthumerian Blood. To test her concoction's potency, she injected the serum into her veins, which resulted in her transformation into a Beast after giving birth to my mother, my 2 Aunts, and my 3 Uncles. However, the Healing Church wasn't exactly...supportive of her experimenting with Old Blood, forcing her and her sisters to be expunged from Healing Church's ranks, hence why my mother, Annabelle, and Catherine were able to retain their humanity when they succumbed to Beasthood."

After such a detailed explanation, Amelia was finally able to comprehend how Clarissa's mother and younger sisters were able to preserve their sentience, despite succumbing to Beasthood. However.....
1543322212222211222222121122111111.title: One Stuffed Vicar

choices: Actually, Amelia had slept a little longer than that....
15433222122222112222221211221111111.content:
Although she was finally able to comprehend the explanation as to how Clarissa's mother and two younger sisters were able to retain their human sentience despite succumbing to Beasthood, Amelia eventually began to realize something: Since Clarissa was biologically related to her grandmother (who was once a member of the Healing Church), there was a good chance that Clarissa will eventually but inevitably become a Beast like her mother and 2 sisters!

Upon looking down at Clarissa, Amelia spoke toward her lover and asked, "DOES THAT MEAN *growl* YOU'LL BECOME A BEAST *snarl* AS WELL?" Of course, in response to what the beastly Vicar had asked her about, Clarissa let out a sigh, looked up at the stuffed antlered beast that was her beloved Amelia and answered, ".....Eventually, yes. I would someday succumb to Beasthood like my mother, Annabelle, and Catherine, my beloved Amelia. However, it's not a matter of 'if I could transform into a Beast', it is more akin to 'when will I transform into a Beast'. That alone is somewhat.....terrifying, yet intriguing."

From there, Clarissa slowly stood up onto her feet, approached the front of Amelia's bloated overstuffed belly, and gently pressed herself against the beastly Vicar's bulging abdomen, inadvertently causing Amelia to emit a light but loud burp from her lupine snout, making her blush out of embarrassment, yet also making Clarissa giggle some out of loving comfort with her transformed lover, as the plump noblewoman spoke once more and said, ".....And yet, when I laid my eyes upon you in your current physical state within Yharnam, my resolve to willingly succumb to Beasthood was cemented firmly, for I don't want you to feel alone in this often cruel world."
