The Cleric Beast wished that it could still physically talk like when it was human but even if he was still somewhat inelegant The poor Cleric Beast did not have a human tongue and could not try to somehow reason with the blood lake.

The Cleric Beast was worried but it had to admit it was kind of relaxing just gently floating above the blood.
It was a good thing that the lake was forcing him above the lake because with his massive waight he would of sunk like the Titanic in seconds.
The Cleric Beast began to wonder why this lake was keeping him in the middle of the lake with no way of escape and why did it let him drink so much of it for hours without doing anything this lake clearly had some form of intelligence did this blood lake...want him to drink all the blood?

The Cleric Beast wished that its arms could be free its belly felt so sore it was so full and after that fall it hurt a lot now.
He wished he could rub it and make it feel better.
But as The Cleric Beast floated there wishing it could rub its big belly suddenly 4 new tendrils came out of the lake around The Cleric Beast.
The Beast almost felt fear again an emotion he thought was long dead in him as the tendrils came up to The Cleric Beast.
He closed his eyes waiting for them to strike and kill him...but that didn't happen....

Instead the tendrils went right to his big sore reddish belly and began to rub his belly.
The Cleric Beast let out a surprised yet pleasured moan "Ooooohhhhhhhhh.....that's...gooooood....."
The blood tendrils were rubbing all the sore spots on his huge small house sized belly rubbing just gently enouth so they didn't hurt The Beast.
The Cleric Beast looked on as the tendrils rubbed and stroked the sides and top of his huge belly.

The tendrils seemned to shift slightly and change as the end of the tendrils turned into strange almost human looking hands made out of thick blood that gently rubbed his big belly sore belly.
Some of the hands even gently slapped his belly like a drum making the Cleric Beast gasp and even rubbed and flicked his big belly button,
After almost half an hour of belly rubbing all the pain seemned the vanish and The Cleric Beast felt completely relaxed floating peacefully in the warm blood having the best and only belly rub he has ever had.

The Cleric Beast was starting to enjoy himself again but he was still worried did this blood lake really want to keep feeding him? but for how long? when would it stop and let him go? or would it keep feeding him till he pops?
Soon after a long belly message the blood tendril hands stooped and went back into the blood lake The Cleric Beast tried to wake up from his wonderful belly massage and pay attention to what was going to happen next the lake was again still and so was he as he waited for what ever came next.

It was then one big thick tendril of gooey blood came out and went up to his face.
The tendril stroked The Beasts left cheek almost as if it was trying to tell The Cleric Beast to not be afraid and just try to relax.
The tendril then slowly went towards The Cleric Beast mouth.

The Beast was beyond full and didn't want to drink anymore in fear of popping like a water balloon and tried to keep his mouth closed but that was sadly no use as the blood was far stronger then him and pried open his maw and began to slowly pour into his mouth and down his throat.
The Cleric Beast was helpless and had no way of stooping this powerful lake of blood from feeding him.
The Cleric Beast gulped down every bit of blood that slowly went down his throat it seemned like the blood lake was trying to ease him into the forced blood feeding like it didn't want to hurt or scare him.

The Cleric Beast had no clue why this powerful blood lake that already had him captured would care so much about his personal comfort.
Time passed by slowly and the blood kept on slowly poring into his mouth only stooping to let the poor Cleric Beast have a small breather before going right back to feeding him.

The Cleric Beast felt so stuffed and full now he looked down to see that his huge belly was already as large as a big family sized house.
His belly has turned from grey to almost completely bright red his belly kept making none stop loud gurgling and sloshing sounds like it was desperately trying to make room for all the blood.
The Cleric Beast felt its rib cage break off rib by rib and fall into the blood letting his belly have more room to grow.

The Cleric Beasts belly had already taken up all of his view and The Beast was forced to tilt his head because his belly was crushing him hard now,
His huge belly was already bigger then him and it seemned like the lake had no plans to stop till he was either nothing but a blood balloon on legs or he exploded like a stick of dynamite.
1543322212222211222222122211111.title: The blood lake was pulling him back to the lake...

15433222122222112222221222111111.content:
(Time skip)

Time seemned to fade into nothing as the endless night went on for what seemned like forever.
Time had no meaning anymore as The Cleric Beast had lost all sense of time since he kept passing out and waking up again and it had lost track of how long it had bean trapped in the blood lake being fed and massaged for hours none stop like a rich man's spoiled fat house cat,

The Cleric Beast was for all porpoises stuck with no way of escape the blood tendrils kept him locked tight and never seemned to lighting up.
And even if the tendrils let go of The Cleric Beast he was far to fat to move anymore anyways.

His belly was beyond full it was straight up imposable.
It was twice as huge as he was now it was fully red and full to brim with not one bit of space left the blood lake had made sure to fill him up till he was at his limit and stooped before he could pop like a balloon.
The Cleric Beast had no idea it could hold this much blood in his belly his belly was so massive that a lot of the time the lake had to put him ontop of his own huge belly so he wouldn't be crushed by his own very heavy belly.

The Cleric Beast looked ridiculous as he lied half passed out ontop of his own boat sized massive red fleshed belly.
The blood lake made sure to keep him as comfy as possible by making sure to rub his belly witch was almost alleyways super sore and painful.
The blood lake also kept him nice and warm throw the never ending night and even sometimes turned into a straight up bobble hot tub that kept him very relaxed.
And it made sure to keep him very well fed too, If The Cleric Beasts belly even shrunk a little bit the lake would make sure to feed him till he was full to brim again,

The Cleric Beast was pretty sure he was going to be trapped here for a very long time till either something could get him free or this very long night of the hunt ends.
But while The Cleric Beast did hate being fed so much that he couldn't move trapped against his will and permanently stuck with a huge painful blood filled belly. He somewhat felt happy here he even felt kind of special.

It seemned like the blood lake didn't just feed him out of impulse with no care or worry but it seemed like the lake of blood kind of cared about The Cleric Beast almost like the lake in a strange way loved him.
Every know and then the lake of blood would use its gooey tendrils to lovingly stroke his cheek or even bring a tendril to stroke his head.
One time a tendril even came up to his face and instead of feeding him it turned into a pair of feminine lips and gave him a loving kiss.
It was very strange it was like the lake thought of The Cleric Beast as less a horrible monster and more of a loving pet or maybe it was deeper then just that.

The Cleric Beast had no real clue what the lake really wanted but it seemned very happy to keep him trapped here forever to feed and take care of.
15433222122222112222221222111111.title: The Cleric Beast was stuck and had no way to es...

154332221222221122222212221111111.content:
Hours seemned to turned into nothing as the night went on and on an endless hunt with no sight of day.
The Cleric Beast was still being fed and taken care of by the lake the lake had no plans to ever let The Cleric Beast go.
The lake of blood never ran dry and it never got bored of feeding its big bellied pet and it hoped to keep him here forever as its own.

The Cleric Beast was beginning to accept its fate it had no idea of he really was starting to enjoy this or if he just had a bad case of stockholm syndrome.
But if this was his fate to be forever stuffed to the bursting brim with delicious drug like blood then he could certainly think of worse fates.....

And so The Cleric Beast stayed trapped in the lake of blood to be fed massaged and cared for.
Stuck for what seemned like forever with a huge towering belly of blood.
The lake was sure one day The Cleric Beast would love it back like it loves him and The Cleric Beast thought that if this night never ends soon it would too...

And so end the tale of The Cleric Beast and The Blood Lake.

154332221222221122222212221111112.content:
How long had it been?
A month? a year? a century? for the monstrous house sized beast time had lost all meaning ever since he was trapped in the blood lake.

This beast known only as The Cleric Beast was once an terrifying monster that would rip men apart with its massive claw and chew up their organs with its huge razor sharp teeth. it went across the land of Yharnam eating up men women and children that got in its way it had no mercy no humanity it had only two goals in its madness filled life and that was to kill all and destroy everything beautiful and fill its starving belly with the blood and guts of its victims.

But that all changed when it began to run of out humans to eat and the once madness filled town of Yharnam became a ghost town filled only with the dead.
The Cleric Beast had no choice to but to go into the forests that surrounded the dead city or starve to death.
The beast soon found an oddity deep in the forest.

In the middle of the tall wooden area The Cleric Beast found a huge lake.
But this was no ordinary lake it was a lake made entirely of thick gooey cooper smelling blood.
It was enouth to make a man sick and to The Cleric Beast it was heavenly.

The beast wasted no time he drank up the blood filling his skinny belly with warm gooey liquid crimson.
The Cleric Beast drank and drank till he had a huge boulder like belly filled with blood.

He thought he was done but as it turned out the lake was not done with him.
When he tried to leave The Cleric Beast found blood tendrils came out of the lake and dragged him into the warm red liquid.
The Cleric Beast was trapped in the lake floating above the blood.
He thought he was done for and the lake would surely kill him but to the beasts surprise the blood lake did not end his life.

Instead with its blood tendrils is feed the blood directly to The Cleric Beast mouth and fed the beast gallons of blood till The Cleric Beast was filled to the brim with a massive and round house sized belly filled with blood.
The blood lake had kept him in the middle of the lake feeding and pampering The Cleric Beast ever since like he was the blood lakes pet.

And now we find ourselfs here.
The Cleric Beast had been stuck in the middle of the lake for god knows how long being fed day in and day out.
The beast had a massive belly filled with blood so big to the point his belly button had turned into an outi and jolted up into the sky.
He had no way of escape and almost accepted his fate.

But their was a light of hope for The Cleric Beast.
The beast while just a monster was no all that dumb.
It began to notice something recently.

While before the blood lake would feed the beast blood none stop till his belly was at bursting point now the lake hardly ever fed him.
The lake would maybe feed him enouth blood to make his huge belly bloat but other then that it was feeding him very little.
The Cleric Beast thought this might be a way to get out while he did kind of like the blood he hated being trapped and treated like a pet.
So as time went on The Cleric Beast saw that his building sized belly was becoming smaller and smaller from the lack of blood.

This was good as not only did it make The Cleric Beast easier to move his bloated body he didn't feel as bloated and huge anymore which the beast found to be a positive.
Time went kept going and The Cleric Beasts once huge belly was now as big as a small boulder which to the huge beast was pretty small

The Cleric Beast now able to move without the heavy weight of his massive gut now just needed an opening.
The lake always kept its blood tendrils around his arms and legs keeping him bound.
But their were times when the blood lake loosened its grip probably because The Cleric Beast never really struggled anymore.
So The Cleric Beast bided its time waited for the perfect opportunity to escape.

The Cleric Beast looked up at the blood moon hanging above in the stary night sky.
The Cleric Beast hated that moon simply because the massive round rock only reminded him off his massive grey dome of a belly.
But no more would the beast be trapped in this blood lake.

As the lake seemned ever so clam The Cleric Beast suddenly began to thrash and claw at the lake.
The blood tendrils were not strong enouth to keep the beast pinned The Cleric Beast began to swam with all its might to the shore of the blood lake.
The beast clawed it way the grassy shore and dug in deep into the ground as the blood tried to drag him back to the middle of the blood lake.
The tendrils even tried to reach his mouth in order to feed him again and inflate his belly with blood to pin him down again.
But it was too late as The Cleric Beast late out an anger filled screech as it pulled itself to the shore and quickly ran out of the lakes grasp.

The Cleric Beast found itself on the grassy ground panting out of breath.
The Cleric Beast looked behind at the blood lake to see the red lake bubbling like the blood lake was boiling.
The Blood lake was anger.....It didn't like that its pet had escaped its grasp.

As for The Cleric Beast it stood on the grassy ground it felt so good to be standing on his own two claws again.
The Cleric Beast felt almost like laughing (If it even could) it had escaped the lake and was free again to terrorise the world.
The Cleric Beast looked down at his still pretty large dome of a belly and patted it with his massive claw.

It made him look silly but soon his belly would be shrink down and be back to normal so he may bring fear to the hearts of men once more.
The beast felt ready to finally leave this place but as it was about to leave and never look or be near the blood lake again
But suddenly The Cleric Beast looked right back at the blood lake as something happened.

The Cleric Beast looked in horror as....
154332221222221122222212221111112.title: More The Cleric Beast story!

1543322212222211222222122211111121.content:
The blood lake began to rise and suddenly rising out of the blood and walking towards the shore was the The Cleric Beast......
But it wasn't The Cleric Beast well not exactly.

It was a near identical clone of The Cleric Beast but made entirely out of blood.
The blood was thick enouth to give the Beast a solid form It looked just like The Cleric Beast in almost every way besides being bright crimson red and dripping all over the place.

It had a massive claw a giant snout filled with teeth and a bony slender appearance.
And to top it off it even had a huge round red belly that was about the same size as the real The Cleric Beast.
This, shall we call it "Blood Beast." was looking right at The Cleric Beast as it walked onto shore.
Its red body shined in the red moons light.

The Cleric Beast was locked facing the Blood beast how was this happening?
Was the blood lake so powerful it could make figures out of blood to walk on the land?
The Cleric Beast felt something it hadn't felt in a long time...fear....

The beast could feel the anger coming from the Blood beast he knew this blood monster wanted him back and it was mad as hell that he tried to escape.
The Cleric Beast screamed at The blood beast in an attempt to scare it away.
But the Blood beast suddenly put its hand up and waved its finger at him like a parent telling off their child.

The Cleric Beast tried to run in away in a desperate attempt to escape.
It found it hard as it ran its big belly jiggled up and down giving him a tummy ache.
But running was no use the Blood beast turned into a fast moving puddle of blood that quickly rushed in front of the running Cleric Beast

Before The Cleric Beast could do anything The blood beast used it massive claw to punch The Cleric Beast right in his big blood filled belly.
The Cleric Beast had all the air rush out of his lungs and he fell to the ground in a massive thud.
He landed right ontop of his already hurt round belly sending waves of pain through his big round grey tummy.

The Cleric Beast moved onto his back and put his claws onto his big pain filled belly trying to rub the pain away.
But The Cleric Beast then looked up and saw the towering Blood Beast stand above him.
This was it The Cleric Beast thought after displeasing the blood lake the blood was finally going to kill him for good.
The Cleric Beast braced for the death blow in fear whimpering like a scared puppy.

But then the The Cleric Beast felt The blood beast grab his arms pull him up and shove him hard into the nearest large old tree.
The blood beast was now facing The Cleric Beast directly.
The Cleric Beast looked down and saw their big bellies were inches apart.

Suddenly The blood beast moved its big round and soiled belly into The Cleric Beasts own massive belly.
The Cleric Beast let out a moan as The blood beasts big round warm belly made out of blood pressed into his big grey dome of a belly.
The blood beast let out gurgled moans as it began to run its belly into The Cleric Beasts belly pressing hard into him making sure he really felt it.

The Cleric Beasts tummy both hurt and felt great as their two bellies rubbed and massage each other.
They could even feel their big outi belly buttons rub and flick against one another.

All The Cleric Beast could think was why?
Why hurt and scare him one minute then rub bellies with him the next? what was this monster made of blood doing?

It was almost like the blood gave him quick and swift punishment at first but when he saw how scared The Cleric Beast was it quickly went back to being gentle and loving again almost as if The blood beast was telling him "Their their...you know I would never really hurt you..now come here and give daddy some love..."

The sloppy kiss continued as The Cleric Beast felt the blood beasts massive red claws rub his big boulder sized belly.
It was so soothing as the blood beast rubbed his massive claws so gently down and up The Cleric Beasts blood filled grey smooth tummy.

The Cleric Beast drank up all the blood that was fed to him and he could feel his already bloated belly fill up with blood going back to the large overstuffed sizes from before.
The blood beast kept rubbing The Cleric Beasts belly as he fed him feeling The Cleric Beasts hard smooth skin grow out as his belly grew in size from all the fresh blood.

The Cleric Beast looked down past the blood beasts snout and at his own belly it was growing in size with each gulp of fresh blood he took.
It terms of the The Cleric Beasts size on him it looked like he had a massive beach ball for a belly but as The Cleric Beast drank down the blood it grew in size taken up more space in front of him.
The Cleric Beast was helpless and could do nothing but kiss the blood beast and drink up all the sweet blood he gave him while watching his belly grow more and more.

Soon The Cleric Beasts belly was half the size of his own body and was almost touching the ground.
His belly felt so full it was like an overfilled water balloon ready to pop.

It was sore from all the pressure so The Cleric Beast rubbed the sides of his poor abused tummy while the blood beast massaged the front lovingly.
It felt nice but The Cleric Beast knew this couldn't go on forever.
His belly was already far past full and was reaching the bursting limit and if this kept up The Cleric Beast had no no doubt he would explode

But the blood beast never stopped or eased up on feeding The Cleric Beast it fed him all the blood it could.
Blood dribbled down The sides of The Cleric Beasts mouth he was so full of blood it was enouth to make any creature sick .

The blood beast had to be at The Cleric Beasts side in order to keep kissing him and feeding him.
The Cleric Beasts arms and legs had go limp as the blood beast and the tree was the only things keep him from collapsing.
The Cleric Beast felt his belly was ready to pop any second now he didn't even care anymore he just waited for it to happen.

But soon as The Cleric Beast felt his belly had finally become just as big as him The blood beast stopped kissing him.

The Cleric Beasts moaned in pain and fullness as his massive belly rested ontop of him smothering him like a big heavy boulder.
His grey full smooth belly was as big as him now and covered him almost completely and was sooooo heavy. he could hardly breath.
The blood beast stood tall above him rubbing The Cleric Beasts full belly with pride. it was happy with how full The Cleric Beast was and patted his belly proudly.

The Cleric Beast could do nothing he knew their was no getting away. and so for the time being he felt the grass between his claws and against his back knowing for a fact he would not be able to enjoy it for long.
And to The Cleric Beasts guess he was right as he felt the blood beast grab his skinny leg and begin to drag him back towards to blood lake which not too long ago he had thought he had escaped for good from.

But slowly The blood beast dragged the big bellied beast back towards the blood lake leaving a long flatted trail from where The Cleric Beast was dragged from.
Soon The Cleric Beast could smell the of so familiar smell of a strong intoxicating copper and iron blood smell that was strong enouth to make a man sick.
The Cleric Beast was inches away from the blood lake shore.

The Blood beast itself walked slowly into the blood lake and became part of it once more.
The Cleric Beast wanted to drag itself away it didn't want to give in but he knew for a fact it was over he belonged to the blood lake and he would never escape again.

The blood lake shot out blood tendrils that wrapped around The Cleric Beasts legs and slowly dragged him in.
The Cleric Beast felt his body sink into the warm thick blood as he was brought all the way back into the middle of the blood lake.
The tendrils wrapped around his arms and legs and kept the bloated beast in place.

Once more The Cleric Beast was back in the middle of the blood lake floating above the blood with his belly large and full of blood.
He truly was back to square one.
15433222122222112222221222111111211111.title: The blood beast drags The Cleric Beast back int...

154332221222221122222212221111112111111.content:
The blood lake was still and their was only the gentle sounds of the wind blowing through the trees and grass companioned by the sounds of The Cleric Beasts overstuffed belly gurgling travelled through the air.

The Cleric Beast had failed to escape and was now trapped again by the blood lake unable to leave.
He didn't know what to do He didn't think the blood lake would ever let him get close to escaping like that ever again.
The Cleric Beast knew deep in his black heart that he was trapped and he would spend eternity trapped in this blood lake like a bird in a cage.

But the beast side of The Cleric Beast did not want to give up that was no in his nature no matter what he would try to get out he would not be this blood lakes pet forever he would be free!
But then as The Cleric Beast had these encouraging thoughts something began to happen .
The lake began to bubble up around him bringing fear once more to The Cleric Beasts heart.
Just then he felt something that made his own black blood go cold.

He was.....sinking. ....

He was slowly being submerged into the blood lake like a sinking ship at sea.
The Cleric Beast tried to struggle to stay a float but it was no use with his heavy belly weighing him down and the blood lake swallowing him up it was useless to resist.

The Cleric Beast felt his whole body begin to sink deep down into the blood lake.
He tried to keep his head above the blood but it was no good.
The blood swallowed him up and he was fully submerged in the blood like never before.
The Cleric Beast slowly sank further and further down the surprisingly deep blood lake.
He tried to hold his breath as best he could and he tried to fight against the blood but no matter how hard the best fought he only sank further and further down deeper into the crimson lake
.
Soon The Cleric Beast felt his back hit the lake bottom.
The Cleric Beast struggled but it was no good his whole body was pinned to the bottom of the lake.
The Cleric Beast thought this was it the end of the line. He had angered the blood lake and now it would take his life.

He tried to hold his breath for as long as he could but his head became light and his lungs hurt.
This was the end....The Cleric Beast thought as he finally let go and took in a big breath of blood into his lungs. knowing this would end him.
But to the The Cleric Beasts surprise. he wasn't drowning.....the blood enter his mouth as he breathed but he didn't drown in it.

Somehow this magical lake made of blood let him breath under the blood.
The Cleric Beast felt a wave of relive rush over him he thought he was a goner for a second their.
154332221222221122222212221111112111111.title: But the blood lake is not done yet.

1543322212222211222222122211111121111111.content:
The Cleric Beast was now trapped at the bottom of the blood lake with the lake and his own massive belly weighed him down to the bottom.
The Cleric Beast was scared at first but soon found it was rather comfortable at the bottom of the blood lake.
The mud and sea weed against his back felt like a bed to him and even at the bottom of the blood lake the blood kept him warm and cosy.

The Cleric Beast knew this was the blood lakes way of making sure he would never escape again.
What better way then keeping him at the bottom forever.

The Cleric Beast could taste and feel nothing but blood all around him it was so intoxicating it was too much.
The strong taste entered his mouth and nose and filled all his senses.
He tried to resist but the blood lake was having a strong affect on him.

He felt his mind become light as his vision was filled with wonderful visions it felt like he was getting drunk of the blood lake.
It was so intoxicating it was driving his already damaged mind mad.
It was like a drug messing with his body and mind.

The Cleric Beast let his mouth open letting bubbles come up to the top as his tongue lay limply at the side of his mouth.
He was drunk of the blood unable to do anything he simply let the blood lake consume him.

The Cleric Beast knew for a fact now he would never escape and the bottom of this lake would be his home till the end of time.
He would never have to do anything or worry about anything ever again the blood lake would take care of him and would never let him go.

Just before The Cleric Beast passed out he felt the blood enter his mouth again as he quickly began to bloat up with ever more blood.
His belly which he thought was past the popping point was growing bigger.
It was even larger then his small frail body now and was reaching up high up to the top of the blood lake.
The Cleric Beast felt like he was attached to a hot air balloon made of blood.

The Cleric Beasts belly grew to an impossible size filling up most of the blood lake.
It was only when the very edge of his huge grey belly reached the top of the blood lake that the blood stopped and let The Cleric Beast finally rest.
From uptop if you were next to the lake you would only be able to see The Cleric Beasts massive belly button piercing through the top of the blood lake.

The Cleric Beast rested his head back against the mud and sea weed and looked up at the top of the blood lake surface to see his massive belly taking up almost all of his view and reaching just optop of his belly peering thorough the surface of the blood lake was the bright pale blood moon looking down at him.
The Cleric Beast soon passed out and fell into a long slumber.
The Cleric Beast was now nothing more but a tiny threatening beast attached to a massive fleshy balloon filled to the brim with blood.

And so this is how The Cleric Beasts tale ends.
He would remain forever trapped in the blood lake being fed and pampered forever.
His mind lost ot the blood nothing mattered anymore but the blood.

He loved the blood and the blood loved him back......
1543322212222211222222122211111121111111.title: The Cleric Beasts final resting place.

choices: A land made entirely out of chocolate
A land made entirely out of meat
1543322212222211222222122212.content:
The pale blood moon was full and shined its red glow upon the cured city of Yharnam.
The old cursed city was in the long night of the hunt and everything had gone to hell. All of the once normal people that inhabited the city where now either raving mad dead or no longer human.

The once busy streets where quiet and socked in dry blood,
The brick buildings and old wooden homes where now boarded up or empty.
This dead city had no life in it anymore the only things that walked the dark streets of Yharnam now where the cursed and the beasts...

One beast a massive house sized monster that was once a normal human wondered through the cold empty streets of central Yharnam looking for its next victim. This beast was known simply as The Cleric Beast once a normal man the cursed old blood had changed him into a inhuman monster.
With an almost half human half beast like body with tattered long black and white hair.
Its skin a dark grey with short black hair covering his boney limbs.
Its long maw was lined with razor sharp teeth and to to top it all of his left arm was a massive strong clawed arm that could rip apart any mortal into ribbons.

Truly the Cleric Beast was a monster that struck fear in the hearts of men.
All human desires and emotions where gone and all that remained was pure animalistic rage its only desires now was to kill and feast on the carcasses of its victims.
It had no mercy and no love left in its black heart only anger rage and desire for more blood...

The Cleric Beast had almost no human intelligence left in its madness and rage filled mind he was driven only by the most basic of desires such as the need for food blood or water and the primal urge to kill.
But unlike most beasts of the night The Cleric Beast had a few brain cells that still worked.

It couldn't say anything as its inhuman tongue could only loudly roar make blood curdling screeches and growl in anger.
But it could still think it could even speak to itself.
The Cleric Beast was wondering the streets there was not one sign of anything living it seemned that The Cleric Beast was alone in this dead city

"Meat..blood...KILL....." The Cleric Beast was always angry and desired its next victim but sadly for him it seemned that there was no prey left in this cursed town. The Cleric Beast wondered the blood coated streets of Yharnam for what felt like ages searching for prey food water anything... but it seemned this town had nothing left " Grrrrrrrhh Thirty...hungry...meat...blood.....need......."
The Cleric Beast had lost all sense of time the night was endless and all he did was stomp through Yharnam The Beasts mouth felt as dry as the desert and his thin belly was so hungry and empty all it did was growl which the beast found so annoying as the rumbling growling noses it made was the only sound that filled the silent dead town along with the beasts stomping feet which the beast hated the sounds off he felt thirsty hungry and tired.

Hours went by and The Cleric Beast was so hungry he slowly stomped throw the empty streets of Yarnam and there was nothing for him to eat or drink.
The Cleric Beast was so thirty that he begun to lick up the dried old blood the stained the city streets and walls just because he was so thirty.
He would drink anything right about now blood or water he didn't care he just wanted to drink something.
If this kept up The Cleric Beast wouldn't even be able to walk soon "Blood..Grrrr..need...blood....need.....water...need...to drink...something..Grrrrr....ANYTHING...."

The beast soon stumbled into an abandoned market to his dismay there was nothing hear either not one meat carcasses no left over blood vials the place was dead just like the rest of the city.
The Cleric Beast felt like screaming his lungs out he couldn't take it anymore was there truly nothing left in this city for him to drink or eat?
How was he to survive in this cursed town? what was the thirty and starving beast to do?

Just as the Beast felt ready to smash apart the near by buildings in anger and frustration he suddenly smelled something with his highly sensitive nose "Sniff...Sniff.... " the beast sniffed the air trying to pin point where the smell was coming from he couldn't tell what it was it didn't smell like blood or meat it wasn't a particularly good smell but The Cleric Beast was desperate enouth for anything that he followed the smell.

The smell lead the horrid beast to the middle of the old market in the middle he saw a huge fountain.
It was old and dirty the Beast could even see blood stains on the fountain but the worst part there was nothing coming out of the fountain it was dry like everything else in this dead town.
But the smell was definitely coming from it so The beast went up to the large fountain and when the beast looked down into the fountain he saw that there was indeed water!

If the beast could smile like a normal human he would be grinning right about now.
It seemned that even though the fountain wasn't working anymore the water was still in it even after all this time.
He looked at the water and sniffed it it smelled awful like bog water it didn't look right either it was so green with light shades of orange and red.
It didn't seem like this water was clean at all what in the world could be in the water to make it smell so bad?
To the Cleric Beasts nose it almost smelled like chemicals where in the water.

But The beast didn't care if it was dirty old fountain water.
It could be the nastiest dirtiest water in the whole world and he would still drink it he was that desperate.
The beast wasted no time and put its mussel to the bottom of the fountain the water tasted awful but to the thirty Cleric Beast it was the best water he had ever tasted!

He begun to drank up big gulps of the nasty contaminated water he drank up as much as he could without stooping to breath it didn't take too long for the contaminated water to lower as the Cleric Beast dark more and more.
It didn't take too long till the fountain was near empty the beast was drinking so much that he didn't even notice the many pennies and coins that where thrown into the fountain that he had swallowed up along with the gross water he was drinking so much that slowly his once thin belly was growing out into a nice cute little pot belly.

His grey round smooth tummy grew out a few inches with ever big gulp he took slowly filling up with more gross contaminated water and cooper pennies and lead coins.
By the time the fountain was empty The Cleric Beast was just sipping up any last drops of gross water he could find till the whole fountain was licked clean.
Not one drop of contaminated water left there was not even one penny left.

The beast sighed in relief feeling as his thirst had finally bean quenched.
He sat next to the empty fountain The Cleric Beast only just noticed his big round pot belly.
The Cleric Beast was surprised by his now big gut even back when he was feasting on hunters he never really got a big round belly but now after drinking up all that nasty fountain water he had a pretty big tummy he put his large claw to his gut and gave it a shake the water sloshed around in his belly and he could even hear the sounds of the pennies and coins jingling inside his stomach.

Even though his thirst was quenched his belly started to feel pretty weird maybe he drank to fast some bad water and a few coins and pennies couldn't make a strong scary beast like him sick...could it?
The Cleric Beast didn't feel sick but his belly still felt really funny after a few minutes he started to feel kind of dizzy.
The Cleric Beast looked at the Yarnam market. The streets and buildings became blurry and everything seemned to be spinning.

He felt so weird and he had no idea what was happening his whole world seemned to be changing as everything in his vision became nothing but blurry random colours.
The Cleric Beasts vision soon started to come back to him he looked forward trying to make out the strange colourful wobbling shapes that filled his vision.
Soon The Cleric Beast could start to make out what he was looking at but it didn't make any sense... was what he was looking at real?

His vision got better and as he saw the wobbling shapes take form The Cleric Beast felt more confused then ever as he saw what was once Yarnam turn into something completely different...
The Cleric Beast looked around and saw that he was now in...
1543322212222211222222122212.title: Another Cleric Beast story

choices: The Cleric Beasts hallucinations and what he was really doing
The Cleric Beast keeps on eating
15433222122222112222221222121.content:
In a land made entirely out of chocolate! The Cleric Beast couldn't believe his eyes was what he was seeing real?
Everything looked so different and strange it looked nothing like the bleak grey city of Yharnam.

His new environment looked like something out of a children's fairytale with bright pink candy floss coloured sky's.
The moon looked like a giant multicoloured jawbreaker that hanged in the sky.
The Cleric Beast could see in the distance mountains that on closer inspection looked like giant cakes of all favours and he could even see forests made out of lollipops.
The ground beneath his feet looked like like soft cake and all around him The Cleric Beast could see big structures around his size that looked like giant house sized cakes and big towering bars of chocolate that littered the landscape The Cleric Beast didn't understand what was happening his mad beast brain couldn't comprehend his new environment.

But the more The Cleric Beast looked at the land of chocolate the more familiar it became to him.
The Cleric Beast started to remember the in his former human life he used to love candy and chocolate he remembered that he used to love pigging out on candy for hours till he was stuffed.
The Cleric Beasts mind was so messed up he couldn't really remember anything about his human life but he did remember that he used to love chocolate is that what this land was?

The more The Cleric Beast remembered about cakes and chocolate the hungrier he became he became almost nostalgic about candy and chocolate he could almost remember just how good chocolate used to taste and how it melted in his mouth or how delicious the creamy goodness of a nice slice of cake was "Mmmmmmhhhh...Cake...chocolate.....hungry...."

The Cleric Beasts mouth watered just thinking about how good candy and chocolate used to be could he forget such a pleasure?
The Cleric Beast had no idea how he got to this new wonderful world but he didn't care after quenching his thirst The Cleric Beast had forgotten just how hungry he truly was he hadn't eaten anything in what felt like days.
His poor belly was so hungry it needed to be filled up to the brim with food And luckily for The Beast everything he wanted was right in front of him.

He had no idea if this was some kind of blessing or how this even happened but he was going to take it and roll with it.
This land of chocolate was his now and everything hear was going into his starving belly every building sized bar of chocolate every giant slice of cake it was all his to eat and no one else's.
The Cleric Beast walked up to a huge house sized bar of chocolate it looked so delicious his belly was rumbling so loudly he had to eat it.

The Cleric Beast first put his mussel to the chocolate stuck his log tongue out and gave it a few licks.
He found it delicious it tasted just how he remembered how chocolate tasted sugary sweet and so so delicious....
The Cleric Beast could wait no longer he had to eat this house sized bar of chocolate till his belly was full.

He opened his massive as wide as he could with his many sharp teeth ready to bite down.
He admittedly took a big bite out of the chocolate and begun to much it was a lot harder then he remembered chocolate being but it was just as delicious as he remembered.
He kept chewing down the hard chocolate till it was nothing but mush and swallowed it down with a loud gulp.
It was delicious and so filling he needed more! He then started taking more bites out of the chocolate munching up the hard chocolate and swallowing it all up his big round tummy grew out with ever gulp filling up his lap and becoming bigger rounder tighter and hard to the touch.

His belly grew out from a nice big pot belly to a really big round shiny grey belly that grew a few inches with every gulp.
The Cleric Beast loved this it was his personal nirvana everything was perfect.
How could anything be possible wrong with this?
15433222122222112222221222121.title: A land made entirely out of chocolate

choices: The Cleric Beast keeps eating and eating
154332221222221122222212221211.content:
Cleric Beast eat and eat but unknown to him The Cleric Beast had no idea what was truly happening to him.
This all seemned so real but in reality none of this was real it turned out that the contaminated water The Cleric Beast had drank had done more bad then good.
It did quench his thirst but the contaminated water did something else to The Cleric Beast it was making him Hallucinate!

The fantasy like candy and chocolate filled dream land the The Cleric Beast was seeing was in reality just plain old grey dark and cold Yharnam.
He didn't telport to some mystical fantasy land made out of desserts everything he was seeing was in his own head.
The contaminated water had affected his mind so badly that it made The Cleric Beast hallucinate this wonderful fantasy world made from his memories and desires.

He had no idea he was still in Yharnam to him the land of chocolate he was in was real and The Cleric Beast thought that the what he was eating really where giant house and building sized chocolate bars and cakes.
But in reality The Cleric Beast wasn't chomping down on a delicious house sized bar of chocolate.
he was really just eating a normal wooden house!

The Cleric Beast was so deep in his fantasy world that he believed what he was eating was really chlorate he thought it looked like Chocolate smelled like Chocolate and tasted like chocolate but it was just an old abandoned wooden house.
The Cleric Beast stood over the house and slowly eat big chunks of the roof.
His teeth where so sharp that they could chew throw the hardest of materials even rock and concrete so even though it was a bit of a hard chew The Cleric Beast munched through the wooden house so easily with little effort till the wood was nothing but splintery mush that the Cleric Beast could easily swallow.

His big round gut grew out with ever new tasty chunk of house filling up with mushed up wood making his already big round smooth tummy grow out into bigger sizes slowly filling up his lap.
The Cleric Beast loved the way the house tasted to him it was just chocolate his mind was so tripped out on the contaminated water that he actually thought what he was eating was really chocolate.
He didn't think for one second that what was eating was just an old house he was so messed up that everything he eat just tasted like chocolaty goodness and nothing else.

The Cleric Beast kept on devouring the house ripping off big chunks devouring the structure and furniture inside like it was nothing.
An hour went by and by and The Cleric Beast had eaten almost the entire house there was nothing left but the base of where the house once stood and a few left over scraps of wood and clay.

The Cleric Beast was so stuffed after eating almost the whole house his once big belly was now a massive round monster of a gut that was a third as big as he was.
It filled his lap and pushed far out in front of him it was so huge that when The Cleric Beast looked down all he could see was the sight of his smooth perfectly spherical light greyed belly he couldn't even see his feet anymore.

The Cleric Beast moved his massive claw and patted his huge belly it felt as tight as a drum he rubbed his claw up and down his gut giving himself a nice belly rub.
The Cleric Beast blushed a little as it couldn't help but find this kind of nice...

He didn't look scary anymore in fact he looked down right cute with such a big belly.
It was the type of belly most people would just want to rub and hug.
His big belly made the scary beast look so cuddly and non threatening it was pretty amazing how just the detail of a large round gut could make the terrifying Cleric Beast look so adorable and cuddly.

The Cleric Beast didn't really like all the extra new weight and while he didn't care much about appearance being a horrifying monster and all he couldn't help but find his belly a bit embarrassing as it did make him look so goofy he imaged most hunters would mistake him for an overbloated giant pig monster rather then the graceful terrifying Cleric Beast he was.

But at the same time he couldn't really hate his new big belly it was a lot better then being a starving boney skeleton.
And his big belly did feel nice and warm and while he didn't want to admit it there was something really nice about having such a huge stuffed belly and rubbing it felt really good.

The Cleric Beast started to wonder if maybe he had a thing for huge bellies? but could that really be a thing? he thought.

The Cleric Beast kept rubbing his huge belly feeling so nicely stuffed and full.
The Cleric Beast begun to wonder if he should start to work off this huge gut maybe he should sleep and try to digest his huge meal.
He couldn't fight hunters if he was so heavy but then The Cleric Beast begun to wonder how was he even going to get back to Yharnam?

He didn't even know if there was a way back out of this strange candy filled world he was now in.
Was he trapped hear? as nice as this place was this didn't really seem like the type of home for a blood crazed monster such as himself.

The Cleric Beast still had no idea he was still in Yharnam to him this ridiculous child like fantasy world made of candy and chocolate seemned real to his tripped out mind.

The Cleric Beast pondered on what to do next but then he looked back up at the many giant cakes and chocolate and candy there was still so much to eat and seeing all this delicious food was making the already stuffed Cleric Beast hunger for more.
He knew he shouldn't he was already way to full but the sight of the massive tower sized cakes house sized bars of chocolate and tree sized lollipops made his sweet tooth go into overdrive.

He wanted more he needed more "Food...more...MORE..."
He couldn't stop his primal urges he wanted to keep filling up his already huge gut he wanted to stuff his greedy face full with cakes and chocolate.
The Cleric Beast gave into his need to feed and went to the next delicious giant food.

He went up what looked like a huge cake it was so huge it was just as big as he was in size.
The Cleric Beast couldn't wait he had to eat this it felt like it was almost begging him to eat it this land was his to eat and he was going to indulge in his gluttons behaviours.

choices: The Cleric Beast gets bigger and greedier
1543322212222211222222122212111.content:
The Cleric Beast ripped out a massive chunk of cake shoved it into his maw and started chewing he found it odd he remembered cake used to be soft and easy to chew and eat but this cake was very hard almost like rock was this cake maybe stale?
Either that didn't matter The Cleric Beasts teeth were sharp enouth to rip apart anything and just because the cake mite of bean a bit stale didn't matter to him it was still delicious and tasted like pure heaven.

He kept munching on the cake till it was nothing but mush and then he swallowed it down with a big gulp his belly grew out a few inches and The Cleric Beast let out a sigh of pleasure he then gave his belly a nice few strokes he loved this being so full and big felt so strangely nice he didn't know why he enjoyed this so much. Maybe he really did have a belly kink if so then The Cleric Beast wasn't going to waist time he was going to keep this wonderful kink going by making his already huge overstuffed belly even bigger.

He kept shoving cake into his mouth and chowing down making his already huge overstuffed belly bigger and bigger with ever bite.
He slowly eat up the cake but of course none of this was really real his hallucinating mind was so tripped out that he had no idea the giant cake he was eating was really a big old brick church that he was slowly devouring from the outside.

He broke off large chunks of brick shoved them into his mouth and munched the brick into brick mush before swallowing it down making his huge belly grow in size.
The Cleric Beast didn't notice for one second that he was eating a church he just thought he was eating some stale yet tasty cake.
He kept taking of chunks of brick and shoving them in his mouth and eating them.

By the time the Cleric Beast had eaten a massive hole into the church roughly twice the size of himself his belly was half as big as him!
His belly was so huge now that he rested on the cold floor in front of him.
It was so massive that even with his huge claws he couldn't reach around his massive gut and the sight of his huge overstuffed gut filled the bottom of his vision even when he was just looking forward.

But he didn't mind in fact he loved it.
The Cleric Beast wasn't sure before but now he knew it he loved his bellies in particular his own massive huggable perfectly spherical shiny grey dome of a gut it felt so overstuffed so full but at the same time it felt so nice warm and heavy.
He was in love with his own belly and he wanted to show his love by making it bigger and rounder.

The Cleric Beast went inside the church in his tripped out vision he thought he had eaten so far into the cake that he was now inside of it and was surrounded by delicious layers of frosting and chocolate fudge.
The Cleric Beast wanted to eat the cake from the inside out and grow bigger.
The Cleric Beast smiled when he thought himself getting so big that he bursts out of the top of the cake like a stripper would in a fake cake belly first.

He started eating at what ever he could grab at inside of the cake and eating it up in reality The Cleric Beast was eating church bench seats picking them up with his mighty claws and chomping down on them upwards like a sandwich.
The Cleric Beast chowed down on ever church bench he could get his greedy claws on he found it so pleasurable to just pig out so much.
He felt so naughty eating so much he should be called The Cleric Pig now since he was such a big bellied glutton.

The Cleric Beast eat and eat stuffing his greedy maw full with brick and wood till suddenly the pressure of his overstuffed belly started to get at The Cleric Beast. He suddenly felt a a great pressure building at the very end of his huge belly that grew stronger with every bite.
Suddenly The Cleric Beast grabbed his belly and grunted when he felt his belly button pop out from innie belly button to a big plump outie belly button.

The Cleric Beast couldn't see over his huge gut but he could feel that thanks to his way to full belly that his belly button had popped out into a cute outie belly button.
The Cleric Beast wished his claws where longer just so he could stroke and flick his now outie belly button.
His big plump bely button was a sign that The Cleric Beast was far to full he should of stooped eating ages ago and this outie belly button was the proof of that.

But The Cleric Beast didn't care at all in fact he felt proud that his belly was so full he wished the stupid masses of the Yharnam people where hear just so they could see his massive gut.
A belly this big deserved to be worshipped and giving the best belly rubs possible he wanted to be treated like a spoiled king.

More then that he wanted to see the weak pathetic hunters quiver in fear as they gazed upon The Cleric Beasts massive mighty belly and tremble as they realise just how big and scary The Cleric Beast truly was.
The Cleric Beast wanted to be treated with the respect and fear he deserved.
If he can get back to Yharnam he would make it his mission to find ever hunter possible and strike true fear into them as he crushes the hunters under his huge gut smothering them with his thick warm smooth belly.

The Cleric Beast couldn't help but grin sinisterly as he thought about all the naughty stuff he wanted to do with his huge belly.
The Cleric Beast then begun to wonder why it was feeling this way... before all it wanted to do was kill and strike terror into the hearts of mortal men but now he was just a belly obsessed glutton who wanted nothing more then to grow bigger and bigger.

Maybe that contaminated water was having more affects on him then expected.
Or maybe deep down The Cleric Beast had always bean in love with bellies.
What ever it was now that he was just a belly with legs he pretty much only cared about eating and getting bigger.
It was a simple but great pleasure that he wanted to keep going till either he is finally to full to eat or he pops like a balloon......

After eating most of the stuff in the church along with most of the church its self.
The Cleric Beast had gotten bored of what he thought was cake he wanted something else now something bigger and sweeter something that would fill his massive gut to the absolute brim.

He walked through the bright pastel coloured land of chocolate looking for his next big meal.
He wanted to make his belly bigger and he was going to fill it up with ever type of heart attack inducing bit of candy he could get his greedy claws on "Bigger....BURRRRP....rounder..urp...more..."

The Cleric Beast couldn't stop burping and hiccuping now ever since he drank the contaminated water he was letting out light cute burps but now he kept letting out window shattering burps loud enouth to wake the dead.
The Cleric Beast found it was getting rather hard to walk now with his huge small house sized gut it was half as big as him and was so heavy.

Also while The Cleric Beast did find having such a huge overstuffed belly to feel amazing he did find it a bit painful he felt ready to burst from a single prick.
And the way his huge gut shifted up and down as he walked was pretty uncomfortable.
His poor legs where also getting so tired from carrying so much weight he had to stop every now and then to catch his breath and rest his tired legs.
If he kept getting bigger The Cleric Beast was sure he would collapse and would probably be stuck and pinned down thanks to his huge belly.

But that didn't mean he wanted to stop eating oh no he wanted to get as big as possible.
There was still so much top eat and he still had room in overstuffed belly.
The Cleric Beast soon came across the mother of all food it was so huge and delicious looking.
The Cleric Beast couldn't believe his eyes it was a massive castle size blueberry pie! The Cleric Beast felt like he had found the greatest treasure possible.

He didn't remember much about his human life but he did remember that his favourite food of all was delicious mouth watering gut filling blueberry pie.
It was as big as a castle so huge that made the giant Cleric Beast look tiny The Cleric Beast wanted to eat the pie it was his and it was going inside of his belly he was going to eat as much as he could he didn't even care if he popped he had to fill his belly with delicious blueberry pie.

it was sooooo big it was literally as big as he was now.

A feeling he had never felt before even when he was human.

truly there was nothing The Cleric Beast couldn't eat

choices: Garrett decides not to indulge his kink
154332221222221122222222121111111112.content:
The Argonian Bartender was still slumbering idly atop the bloated belly of the drunken, scaly thief. The sound of Chaus' belly gurgling and groaning was soothing for Garrett as he continued sleeping peacefully, with Chaus, none the wiser. As night time came, however, despite the vast amount of alcohol consumed, Chaus; shockingly, would gradually awaken to find his hangover wasn't nearly as bad he had expected it to be. Perhaps courtesy of the vast amount of food still sitting in his rounded belly, but minus a fairly notable headache, he was no worse for the ware.

It was when he felt something pressing against his stomach that he found himself taken back. The thief's eyes slowly drifted up to his big belly, and, much to his surprise, the bartender had used it as something of a pillow, resting idly atop it within the empty, now closed tavern. Chaus wasn't sure to make of it at first. Perhaps Garrett was just too tired helping out. Regardless, Chaus smirked as he jostled his gut a bit, causing the internal bubbling and rippling to his scaly belly to catch Garrett's attention, and quickly rouse the bartender awake. Then, upon seeing a groggy Chaus awake, and smirking at Garrett, the bartender's face immediately reddened as he sat up and pulled himself aside from Chaus.

"O-Oh, g-g'd evening, Chaus," Garrett said, trying to play it cool, before clearing his throat and changing the subject. "So...seems you won the bet..." he muttered, glancing down at Chaus' plump, scaly belly for a moment.

Chaus, meanwhile, rested his palm against his gut, rubbing over every inch of it as he nodded to himself and licked his chops and said, "As if there was ever any doubt. Bit of advice? NEVER doubt how much I can put away, because that's one bet you're never gonna win...speaking of..." Chaus sat up, his fat belly spilling down onto his lap as he continued rubbing over it, and grinning cockily at Garrett. "I do believe I WON that little bet of yours...which means, all I can eat and drink...on the house. And now that you know what I can put away, hehe, you better believe I'm gonna take advantage of that."

Garrett, for his part, occasionally glanced back at that perfectly spherical belly of the Argonian, watching Chaus rub it slowly and soothingly, then immediately found himself looking skyward, chuckling nervously.

"H-heh, yeah, looks that way...and a bet's a bet...congratulations, by the way..."

Chaus bowed his head, still smirking, but he never once took his eyes off Garrett, more specifically, the way Garrett was looking at him...or rather, his currently plump midsection. The aversion in Garrett's eyes, the evasive behavior, the way he found Garrett in the morning, and, of course, the way the bartender occasionally bit his scaly lip, it was all too obvious...

"Say, Garrett..." Chaus began, catching the bartenders attention. "Y'know, my gut IS still fairly jam packed..." and for emphasis, Chaus gave his scaly belly a hefty slap, causing it to jostle a bit as a result, and once again, making Garrett avert his gaze, "...and unless I wasn't PISS drunk...you were tending to it quite nicely earlier."

Giving the Argonian bartender a knowing look, the scaly thief smirked once more.

"Care to give it your attention again?"

Garrett glanced back at Chaus, then down at his domed gut, fidgeting a bit as he thought to himself for several moments, before finally, turning back to Chaus...

Garret said: "I bet that you go steal something in the mountains for me."
Chaus snorted. "Steal? Is that all? That's way too easy!" he exclaimed, followed by a short fit of laughter; "Come on man: give me something harder."
"O, but this is going to be hard," said Garret, flashing a toothy grin.
Chaus' amused smile dropped, feeling the ominous words in his tone.
"So, what do you want me to steal?" he asked.
Gerret said: "I want you to steal from a dragon, of course!"
If Chaus was not an argonian, he might have felt a cold shiver run down his back, but he was cold-blooded and sweated instead.
"A dragon," he repeated.
Garret nodded. "Yes, a dragon."
Chaus swallowed. From all the things he stole from (kings, lords, knights, wealthy travelers), he had never stole anything from a dragon before, but he wasn't about to chicken-out because of that.
Instead he said, "Bet excepted," and drained his last cup of wine with the innkeeper, sealing the deal.

154332221222221122222222121121.content:
Garret, the Argonian bar keeper of the town, was cleaning up his respected business, dressed in his casual clothing that consisted mainly of an apron, shirt, and pants, washing cups, wiping tables, and moping the floor, when he heard someone enter his bar.
"Sorry, we're closed," he said, not even looking at the person who entered.
"Aw," a familiar voice complained in a playful way, "And here I thought that me and you could share a drink together. Well, I best be off then."
Garret swirled around, calling: "No, Chaus, wait."
The lean Argonian stopped in his tracks, turning to the bar keeper.
"O, but I thought you were closing," Chaus Peritius said, a mocking grin on his face.
Garret sigh, frustrated. "Don't be such a ass, Chaus! You know your always welcome after hours," he said.
The two settled down at the bar's counter and catched up on old times. Garret's day was pretty boring; there wasn't a lot of costumers today. But Chaus' day was much more exciting; he stole a bunch of very valuable things away from some sorcerer. Garret also saw that he used his newly required wealth to buy him some good clothing; he was dressed in thickly padded leather tunic and wore leather pants as well. Across his chest was a strap (which held his short sword and dagger in place) fitted with rubies.
"Most of the stuff I stole is magical, but I'm not sure what this does though." He produced from his pocket a locket made from solid gold. Inside was a picture of some sort of entity surrounded by piles of food. "So I was thinking that you should have it."
Garret excepted his gift happily. In return he gave Chaus a free meal, drink, and place to sleep for the night.
Garret went to sleep that night as well with the locket around his neck. When he fell asleep, the thing began to glow...
154332221222221122222222121121.title: Yes.

1543322212222211222222221211211.content:
Garret awoke the next morning feeling a little bit heavier, but he shrugged off the feeling as pure imagination. He got himself dressed, ignoring how his clothing felt a little tighter as well,and went to open up the bar for a new day.
"Morning, Chaus," Garret greeted his friend when he came downstairs yawning and rubbing his eyes.
"Morning to you too, Garret," Chaus said in return.
"Going out for another day of robbing people blind?" the innkeeper ask, tugging on his pants when it suddenly felt smaller in his frame.
"Yeah," Chaus admitted, "I see that you're still wearing that locket I gave you; looks nice on you."
Garret fondled with the gold necklace. "Thanks. I slept with it all night."
Chaus snorted with amusement. "Pretty protective of the thing, hey? Anyway, I'm off. Got a busy day ahead of me."
After Chaus left the bar filled up with costumers.
"Got a busy day ahead of me as well," Garret thought to himself, tucking at his shirt that started to feel smaller too.

1543322212222211222222221211212.content:
The night was relatively uneventful, but it was the strangest thing...Garrett had some very peculiar dreams. Namely, the Argonian creature dreamed of vast amounts of food, and inhaling as much as he could possibly fit into his scaly maw. Which was notably out of character for him for many reasons, among others, simply because Garrett was someone who believed in moderation, hence his far more lean frame.

Chaus was someone who typically had no problem making a pig of himself, but due to his vastly more active and adventurous lifestyle, he ended up with a phenomenally quick metabolism, and always managed to burn off whatever pounds were added in any feasting.

Nonetheless, this was peculiar for Garrett. Doubly peculiar, was the DEEP rumbling that emitted from his trim stomach, actually making the Inn Keeper wince from discomfort. Gently rubbing his stomach, the creature decided he could hold off on opening just yet in favor of making himself something to eat.

After all, it was hard to be an efficient Innkeeper on an empty stomach, right?

So, Garrett headed to the kitchen to whip himself up a breakfast to get him going for the rest of the day, and hopefully, put this rather deep hunger to rest...

         "Ahhhh, that was pretty good, eh Sun?" Hau sighed and looked over at his friends, rubbing his belly contently after eating a Big Malasada. "Oh...Moon, you've hardly touched yours!"

He began chomping down as if he hadn't just eaten a full Big Malasada on his own just moments earlier.          Before Hau, could say a word, Sun opened one eye and sighed, "Go ahead, Hau. I may have beaten you in battle outside, but you're the winner when it comes to Malasada-Eating Contests." Moon covered her mouth as she suppressed a giggle while Hau practically inhaled the remainder of his friends' food.

         "Moon! That pun was as bad as Professor Kukui's!" Sun exclaimed, before they all fell into a fit of laughter. He patted Hau's shoulder and teasingly said, "Come on Munchlax, we haven't even hit our first trial yet! We've gotta get out of Hau'oli City before our journey really begins!"

154332221222221122222222221212.content:
It was another slow and boring day for Gregg, barely anybody visted the Snack Falcon on his shift, so he'd be stuck at the counter waiting for a customer that never seemed to arrive. Just as Gregg was about to give up hope on having an interesting shift, Mae arrives, walking striaght up to the counter.

Gregg immediately perks up, "Hey Mae" he says with massive amounts of enthusiasm as he leans against the counter "Sup Gregg" Mae responds nonchalantly as she looks around the Snack Falcon "Pretty dead in here isn't it?" She says looking back at Gregg, "Yeah.." He sighs "It's been like this for the past few days, it's sooo boooring!" Gregg exclaims while waving his arms around in his overly exuberant manner, "Seriously? Not one person?" Mae asks as Gregg stops waving his arms around, "Nope, nobody, other then you and Steve Scriggins that is" Gregg says as he walks around the counter and over to Mae "I wouldn't really count him as a person" She responds with a mild frown, thinking about Steve Scriggins and how much of an ass he was.

Gregg nods in agreement as he quickly changes the subject, "So what are you doing here?" He asks tilting his head slightly, "I was wondering if you wanted to hang out, I'd ask Bea but she's busy with work right now" She replies, "But I don't want you to get in trouble with your boss" She responds, "Nah it's fine, Christine doesn't really bother checking up on me right now" He says putting his hands into his jacket pockets "And Angus isn't in town right now, so I'm up for anything!" Gregg exclaims pulling his hands out of his pockets as he stretches out his arms, "Where's he gone?" Mae asks folding her arms as Gregg lowers his back down to his sides, "Something to do with his family, said he's going to be away for a few weeks" He says in a saddend tone, "But now that gives me more time to hang out with you" He's perking up as quickly as he did earlier.

Mae unfolds her arms and smiles "So does that mean we get to do.." She says as she leans over to Gregg and whispers "Crimes?" She leans back from Gregg as he smiles and responds "Crimes" They both nod at each other as they go to leave the Snack Falcon. But not before they hear a loud rumbling coming from Greggs stomach, "Oh, heh, must of skipped lunch" He says blushing and rubbing the back of his head in an embarrassed manner, "Do you want to go somewhere to eat?" Mae asks, "You can't do crimes on an empty stomach" She says while moving to just about to open the door, "Sure that sounds great, where do you want to go?" Gregg asks.

So, where do you want to go for food?
