1543322212222211222222222212121.content:
As Gregg and Mae leave the Snack Falcon, Mae starts to think about something she'd never thought about before. She was thinking about Gregg and what he might look like if he was rounder, and through this thought she hatched a plan to make Gregg as big as reasonably possible, though she'd have to do it subtly, cause there was no way Gregg would ever agree to this, besides, it might be more fun this way.

When they finally arrived at The Clik Clak Diner, they both noticed that it was also surprisingly quiet, with only a handful of staff on duty, "Wonder where everybody is?" Gregg asks as he walks over to a booth at the back and takes a seat, "Maybe they're all still at work" Mea responds as she follows Gregg to the booth, "Probably" Gregg replies shrugging his shoulders, "Means a quicker service for us I guess" He says while picking up a menu and look at the options on offer. Mea also grabs a menu and takes note of the various food items and which one would best suited for en-biggening Gregg, but then she realises how much it might cost, so now she has to think which item is less expensive but also highly fattening, "Thought of anything yet?" Gregg asks from behind the menus he was holding, "Hmm, not sure yet, you can pay for this right?" Mae asks as she continues reading the menu, "Oh yeah I should be fine, got a decent pay day recently and I've got a bit of extra cash from it" Gregg replies as he puts the menu down, "Ah that's good to hear, because I think I've got a few things to order" Mae says as she puts down the menu on top of Greggs and moves them over to the corner of the booth table, "Great! Would you mind doing the order? I've gotta go to the mens room" Gregg says as he motions towards the toilet doors, "Yeah sure thing" Mea says as Gregg gets up from the table and goes through to the mens room, Mae smiles to herself as she gets her plans moving along.

As Gregg finishes drying his hands and walking out the mens room, he notices the smell of pizza, his mouth starts to water as he walks over to the table and sits down, "Wow that looks good" Gregg says, eying the pizza, "Yeah it looks like they've improved somehow" Mae responds grabbing a slice, Gregg also doing the same, "Only one way to find out" He says as he shoves the slice into his mouth, savoring the melted cheese and pepperoni slices, quickly finishing it off as he puts the crust back onto the tray and goes for another slice, "Mmm, pizza good" Mae says as she just finishes her first slice, grabbing her second one, noticing Gregg has now moved on to his fourth slice, which he also quickly devours and moves on to his fifth and sixth slice, leaving only the crusts, "You really were hungry weren't you?" Mae says as she eats he second slice, "Heh, well I did say I skipped lunch" Gregg replies after quickly finishing his sixth slice, "Still a little bit hungry though" He says looking over at the pizza tray, now only covered with pizza crusts and small bits of grease, "Good thing I ordered some pierogis" Mae says as the pizza tray is removed and a large tray with a mountain of various flavoured pierogis is shoved on to the table, "Nice!" Gregg exclaims as he is about to grab a handful, Mae stops him, "Hey I've got an idea" Mae says, "Remember a few months ago when I tossed pierogis into your mouth?" She says as she pulled the tray over to her, "Oh yeah I remember that, I also remember you missing almost every time and hitting me in the face with them" Gregg says while pointing out the various spots she had tossed a pierogi at his face, "I had to explain to Angus why my fur was so greasy" He says "It took an hour for me to wash it out!" He exclaims while waving his arms in the air, "It'll be fine, I promise, I've also worked on my aim so I won't miss as much" Mae explains, Gregg puts his arms down and gets into a comfortable position "Alright fine, just try not to hit me in the eye this time" He says as he opens his mouth ready for his first Mae delivered pierogi.

Mae aims carefully and flings the pierogi into Greggs waiting maw, first a normal meaty one, then a spicy jalapeno one and then a vegetable, she keeps the same pattern going, all the while noticing how round Greggs middle was getting and how it had started to push out against his leather jacket, causing one of the buttons to look like it was about to pop off, Mae some how managed to hold back a blush as she saw the foxes belly growing in front of her, but she had her mind set on not missing a single shot and when when she got down to the final one, she made sure it'd hit its mark, with a final toss it landed in Greggs maw and went down into his bloated belly, "Oof that was filling" Gregg said as he leaned back causing his jacket to strain, "I think you got all 30 of them down" He said as he and Mae slowly got up from the booth, leaving some cash for the bill on the table behind them, "I told you wouldn't miss" Mae said while looking at Greggs massive middle, forcing herself not to prod or stroke it. As they leave the Clik Clak Diner, Gregg starts puffing, "Hey uh Mae?" Gregg asks, "Would you mind helping me back to mine and Angus's? I think I ate a bit too much" He says as Mae moves one arm around his back to help him move with his swollen bulk, "Sure thing dude" She says as they both walk to the appartment building. When they finally arrive, Mae slowly lets Gregg down onto the sofa and closes the door, "You alright?" She asks looking over Gregg, trying not to completely focus on his round belly, "Yeah I'll be fine" He says while adjusting himself on the sofa, "I just need to sleep this off that's all" He says as he pulls the zipper down his jacket, revealing his grey shirt just bearly covering his round belly, his belly fur just poking out slightly, Mae blushes at the sight, desperately trying not to think about grabbing it and squishing it and kneeding it, "You alright?" Gregg asks raising one eyebrow, "Y-yeah I'm perfectly fine!" Mae says, "I-I was just thinking about Angus..." She says in her most convincing manner possible, "And his sweet ass? Yeah I don't blame you" Gregg said smiling, now thinking about his boyfriends ass, "But he is mine remember?" He says in his 'serious' tone, "Yeah I know" Mae says, "But that wasn't was I was thinking about" She replies, "I was thinking about how he might react to you spending your money like that" She says, still trying not to look at Greggs belly for too long, "Oh it'll be fine, he's away for a few weeks remember, besides, he'd be fine with it any way" Gregg says as he sits upright on the sofa, "I'll be fine by myself for a few weeks" He says as he puts both hands on his belly, still not noticing it or its largeness, "Well, I could stay here the night if you wanted? I'm sure my partents would be fine with it" Mae says, "Only if you're cool with it though" She says while sitting down next to Gregg, "Of course I'd be fine with it!" Gregg exclaims, "We can have a night together, maybe watch a terrible movve or something" He suggests while moving up the sofa to get more comfortable, "Awesome, I'll just phone my folks, check its ok" Mae says as she goes over to the phone and starts to dial her house number, "Great" Gregg says as he lies down on the sofa and falls asleep.

"Thanks mom, love you too" Mae says as she finishes the call and looks over at the sleeping Gregg, "Oh I'm going to have fun making you big" She says quietly while looking over the sleeping fox, "I'm sure Angus won't mind a bigger boyfriend, more to play with that way" She says as she walks over to the kitchen and looks in the fridge, "Looks like Angus cooked you some stuff before he left" She says to herself, looking over the various foods, then closing the fridge to go rest of the sofa next to Gregg, "sweet dreams big guy" She says as she quickly drifts off to sleep.
1543322212222211222222222212121.title: The Clik Clak Diner (Lots of pierogis and pizza...

choices: It's Steve Scriggins (Boo! this crocodile is an ass!)
Another option (Anyother character from Night in the Woods)
15433222122222112222222222121211.content:
Morning quickly came, as Mae slowly woke up and got off the sofa, trying not to wake up Gregg, who was now looking a lot pudgier and softer, much to Mae's delight. She was tempted to get a proper look at Greggs rounder body, but first she thought it might be a good idea to cook something for them to eat first, so she walked over the the fridge and grabbed a few eggs and some bacon, turning on the stove and as best she could, cook up some omelettes with bacon. Just as she finished cooking, Gregg slowly walked into the kitchen and sat down at the table, " I didn't know you could cook" Gregg said with surprise as he'd never seen Mae cook anything that wasn't using a microwave, "My mom is teaching me a few things, might as well try them out" Mae said while giving Gregg a plate full of omelettes and a stack of bacon, "Smells great and tastes even better!" Gregg said as he started to chomp down on his meal, Mae nodded in agreemeant as she ate her slightly smaller portion, mainly watching Gregg and his full figure.

She noticed how his arms and neck were slightly plumper and how his cheeks had a slight roundness to them, when she looked to the side to view Greggs belly, she noticed how it slowly pushed out from under his grey shirt and how tight his jeans looked from his growing body. Gregg quickly finished his meal and leaned back against his chair, "That was good, we should hire you as our personal chef" He said as he rested both hands on his slightly rounder belly, Mae chuckled, "Heh, you could afford me if I was" She said as she finished off here small meal, Greg smiled and got up from his chair and put the dishes in the sink, "You're right, it's much easier to have Angus do that for me" He said while cleaning the dishes, "Angus would do a lot of things for you without even asking" Mae said as she got up from her seat, "He's great like that" Gregg said as he finished the the dishes, "I should probably have a shower" He says quickly changing the subject, "Or do you want to go first?" He asks motioning toward the bathroom, "Uh sure, thanks Gregg" Mae says as she goes towards the bathroom, "I'll be quick" She said before shutting the door behind her.

Mae looked in the mirror at her refelction, noticing the bags under her eyes, "You need to sleep on a proper bed" She said quietly to herself, before stepping into the shower and turning it on. Gregg waited outside the bathroom patiently on the sofa, hoping Mae would be done soon so he could get to work and possibly get something to eat, thinking about it, since last night he was thinking about food a lot more, but he couldn't but his finger on as to why. Just as Gregg was in thinking about it, Mae came out of the bathroom, "Uh Gregg?" She asked, "Can you help me with something?" She said while motioning into the bathroom, "Uh sure" Gregg said as he walked over into the bathroom and immediately noticed what Mae needed help with, she had somehow gotten one of her shoes onto the bathroom cabinet, a little confused though still willing to help his best friend, Gregg hopped onto something to grab the shoe with ease, what Gregg didn't know was that the thing he hopped on was some scales, Mae leaned in as Gregg reached for the shoe, the scale read Greggs weight at 219 pounds, Mae tried to hide her pleased shock, but then Gregg turned around to hand her the shoe, "You alright?" Gregg asked slightly confused, "O-oh Yeah I'm fine, I'm just happy you got my shoe back" Mae said as he manged to fool Gregg once again, "I better get going, you've got work to get to" She said as she put her shoe back on and then started to walk towards the door, "Yeah you're right, it was awesome hanging out with you!" Gregg said with enthusiasm, "It was awesome, meet you later after work?" Mae asked as she opened the door, "That'd be great!" Gregg says as he moved towards the door, "Great! I'll see you later Gregg" Mae said as she left towards the elevator, "Later!" Gregg said as he closed and locked the door.

After a quick shower and a change of clothes and his leather jacket, which felt a bit tighter then a few days ago, "Maybe they shrank in the wash?" Gregg said to himself as he walked out of the bathroom and over to the appartement door, going though it and on his way to the Snack Falcoln. When he finally arrived he noticed that everthing was the same as he left if before, quickly going behind the counter and getting ready for the next customer, which just so happened to be...

Who will this customer be?

154332221222221122222222222112.content:
Silent Hill on the surface looked like an normal holiday town but underneath the calm scenery and cherry people lied a dark secret.
Silent Hill was an evil town with great power and a dark history.
The town could show you your worst fears and bring nightmares to life everything you have ever feared or regretted can be brought to life in this town and used to kill you.

In the town of Silent Hill in the old lakeside amusement park the evil of Silent Hill was changing this old park and turning it into a playground of pure evil.
A girl named Heather walked through the amusement park with a gun in hand ready to kill what ever monsters from hell that try to jump her.

All around the park were mascot costumes littered around the park they had stained blood their their mouths making it look like something had died in the suits or they had been eating something bloody.
It brought fear to the young girl who thought at any moment they would spring to life and try to eat her.
Luckily no such thing happened but the idea along was enouth to bring her fear.

But in the park another dead mascot that was sitting on a park bench suddenly sprang to life.
The powers of Silent Hill brought the dead mascot to life in order to bring fear and pain to everything it came across.
But today Silent Hill was going to be creative with how it fucked with peoples minds.

The mascot in question who shall be called Robbie the rabbit since that's what he is and monsters don't really have names sat up from his seat and looked at his body.
He looked at his big pink fluffy hands in amusement and flicked his long bunny ears with joy.
From his bloody mouth came a super high pitched giggle

Robbie the rabbit had only been alive for a few minutes and with the evil of Silent Hill flowing through his body all he wanted to do was cause pain and misery to every human he came across.
But their was something else he wanted to do something his furry evil brain just couldn't truly figure out.
It was then from his belly he heard a low grumbling noise.

He brought his paws to his belly and patted his gut he was hungry somehow.
Robbie put his paw to his chin and wondered what he should do.
Being an evil monster his first thought was of course eating the girl Heather but he didn't know where she was and didn't want to run around the park looking for her.

It was then Robbie the rabbit smelled something.
Robbie followed his noise and went after the pleasant scent.
The giant bunny walked through the rusted and blood stained park of hell and found himself at....

info.brief_description: Video Game characters from different games gain weight
info.description:
Various video game characters are gaining weight and you decide how! Anything goes be it stuffing, force feeding, vore and anything else you come up with. Just keep the additions lengthly and don't end the chapters to quickly.

Finally, avoid violence and death (unless integral to the story). Most importantly....WRITE ON!
